yosuwa:1:1: Imana itoranya Yosuwa ngo azungure Mose1.Ubwo Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yari amaze gupfa, Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa mwene Nuni umufasha wa Mose ati
yosuwa:1:2: 2.“Umugaragu wanjye Mose yarapfuye, none ubu haguruka wambukane n’aba bantu bose ruriya ruzi rwa Yorodani, mujye mu gihugu mbahaye mwebwe Abisirayeli.
yosuwa:1:3: 3.Aho muzakandagira hose ndahabahaye nk’uko nabwiye Mose.
yosuwa:1:4: 4.Uhereye mu butayu no kuri uriya musozi Lebanoni ukageza ku ruzi runini rwitwa Ufurate, igihugu cyose cy’Abaheti no kugeza ku Nyanja Nini y’iburengerazuba, ni rwo rugabano rwanyu.
yosuwa:1:5: 5.Nta muntu n’umwe warinda kuguhagarara imbere iminsi yose yo kubaho kwawe. Nk’uko nabanaga na Mose ni ko nzabana nawe, sinzagusiga kandi sinzaguhāna.
yosuwa:1:6: 6.Komera ushikame, kuko uzatuma aba bantu bazungura igihugu narahiye ko nzaha ba sekuruza babo.
yosuwa:1:7: 7.Icyakora ukomere ushikame cyane, kugira ngo witondere amategeko yose umugaragu wanjye Mose yagutegetse. Ntuzayateshuke uciye iburyo cyangwa ibumoso, kugira ngo ubashishwe byose aho uzajya hose.
yosuwa:1:8: 8.Ibiri muri iki gitabo cy’amategeko ntukarorere kubihamisha akanwa kawe, ahubwo ujye ubitekereza ku manywa na nijoro kugira ngo ubone uko ukurikiza ibyanditswemo byose. Ni ho uzahirwa mu nzira zawe, ukabashishwa byose.
yosuwa:1:9: 9.Mbese si jye ubigutegetse? Nuko komera ushikame, ntutinye kandi ntukuke umutima, kuko Uwiteka Imana yawe iri kumwe nawe aho uzajya hose.”
yosuwa:1:10: Yosuwa abwira abantu yuko bazambuka Yorodani10.Yosuwa ategeka abatware b’imitwe ati
yosuwa:1:11: 11.“Munyure mu ngando mutegeke abantu muti ‘Nimukore amahamba kuko mu minsi itatu muzambuka ruriya ruzi rwa Yorodani, mujya guhindūra igihugu Uwiteka Imana yanyu yabahaye mukibemo.’ ”
yosuwa:1:12: 12.Yosuwa abwira Abarubeni n’Abagadi n’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase ati
yosuwa:1:13: 13.“Mwibuke rya jambo Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yabategetse ati ‘Uwiteka Imana yanyu irabaruhuye, ibahaye iki gihugu.’
yosuwa:1:14: 14.Abagore banyu n’abana banyu n’amashyo yanyu bizasigara mu gihugu Mose yabahaye cyo hakuno ya Yorodani, ariko mwebwe ab’intwari mwese mubanzirize bene wanyu kwambuka, mwitwaje intwaro kugira ngo muzabarwanire,
yosuwa:1:15: 15.kugeza aho Uwiteka azaruhurira bene wanyu nk’uko namwe yabaruhuye, na bo bagahindūra igihugu Uwiteka Imana yanyu yabahaye. Nyuma muzasubire mu gihugu mwahindūye mukibemo, icyo Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yabahaye hakuno ya Yorodani iburasirazuba.”
yosuwa:1:16: 16.Na bo basubiza Yosuwa bati “Ibyo udutegeka byose tuzabikora, n’aho uzadutuma hose tuzajyayo.
yosuwa:1:17: 17.Nk’uko twumviraga Mose muri byose nawe ni ko tuzakumvira, icyakora Uwiteka Imana yawe ibane nawe, nk’uko yabanaga na Mose.
yosuwa:1:18: 18.Uzagomera itegeko ryawe wese, ntiyumvire n’amagambo yawe mu byo uzamutegeka byose azicwa. Icyakora komera ushikame!”
yosuwa:2:1: Rahabu yakira abatasi abahisha1.Bari i Shitimu, Yosuwa mwene Nuni yohereza abagabo babiri rwihishwa ngo bajye gutata. Arababwira ati “Nimugende mwitegereze igihugu cyane cyane i Yeriko.” Nuko baragenda binjira mu nzu ya maraya witwaga Rahabu bararamo.
yosuwa:2:2: 2.Umwami w’i Yeriko abwirwa yuko muri iryo joro haje abagabo bo mu Bisirayeli gutata igihugu.
yosuwa:2:3: 3.Uwo mwami atuma kuri Rahabu ati “Sohora abo bagabo bari iwawe, kuko bazanywe no gutata igihugu cyose.”
yosuwa:2:4: 4.Ariko uwo mugore ajyana abo bagabo bombi arabahisha, abwira intumwa ati “Ni koko iwanjye haje abagabo ariko ntazi aho baturuka,
yosuwa:2:5: 5.nuko bumaze kwira igihe cyo kugarira kigeze, abo bagabo baragenda sinzi aho bagannye. Nimubakurikire n’ingoga murabafata.”
yosuwa:2:6: 6.Ariko ba batasi yari yaburije inzu abahisha hejuru yayo, abatwikira imigwegwe yari yatondekanije.
yosuwa:2:7: 7.Nuko ba bandi babagenzereza mu nzira igana kuri Yorodani aho bambukira, ababagenza bamaze kugenda barugarira.
yosuwa:2:8: Basezerana uko bazabigenza8.Nuko batararyama uwo mugore arurira abasanga hejuru y’inzu,
yosuwa:2:9: 9.arababwira ati “Nzi yuko Uwiteka abahaye igihugu kandi mwaduteye ubwoba, ndetse abari mu gihugu bose mwabakuye umutima,
yosuwa:2:10: 10.kuko twumvise uburyo Uwiteka yakamije Inyanja Itukura muyigezeho muva muri Egiputa, n’ibyo mwagiriye abami bombi b’Abamori bo hakurya ya Yorodani, Sihoni na Ogi, abo mwarimbuye rwose.
yosuwa:2:11: 11.Tubyumvise uwo mwanya imitima yacu ishya ubwoba, nta muntu n’umwe mutakuye umutima, kuko Uwiteka Imana yanyu ari yo Mana yo hejuru mu ijuru no hasi mu isi.
yosuwa:2:12: 12.None ndabinginze, nimundahire Uwiteka ko muzagirira neza inzu ya data nk’iyo mbagiriye, mumpe ikimenyetso cy’ukuri
yosuwa:2:13: 13.yuko muzarokora data na mama, na basaza banjye na barumuna banjye n’abo bari kumwe, mugakiza amagara yacu ntidupfe.”
yosuwa:2:14: 14.Abo bagabo baramusubiza bati “Amagara yacu mukijije natwe tuzabitura gukiza ayanyu. Nimutatubūra, Uwiteka namara kuduha igihugu tuzakwitura ineza. Ni iby’ukuri.”
yosuwa:2:15: 15.Arabohereza, abamanuza umugozi abanyujije mu idirishya kuko inzu ye yari hejuru y’inkike y’umudugudu, ni ho yari atuye.
yosuwa:2:16: 16.Nuko arababwira ati “Mujye mu misozi kugira ngo mudahura n’ababagenza, mumareyo iminsi itatu mwihishe kugeza aho ababagenza bazahindukirira, nyuma muzigendere.”
yosuwa:2:17: 17.Abo bagabo baramusubiza bati “Iyi ndahiro uturahije nta mugayo uzatubaho.
yosuwa:2:18: 18.Nitugera muri iki gihugu uzapfundike aka kagozi gatukura ku idirishya uducishijemo, ariko so na nyoko na bene so n’abo mu rugo rwa so bose, uzabateranirize iwawe.
yosuwa:2:19: 19.Nihagira umuntu uva mu nzu yawe agasohoka, amaraso ye ni we azabaho twe nta rubanza ruzatubaho. Kandi umuntu wese uzaba ari hamwe nawe mu nzu, amaraso ye azatubeho nihagira umwakura.
yosuwa:2:20: 20.Ariko nutubūra ntituzagibwaho n’urubanza rw’indahiro uturahije.”
yosuwa:2:21: 21.Na we arababwira ati “Bizaba nk’uko muvuze”, maze arabasezerera baragenda. Nyuma apfundika akagozi gatukura ku idirishya.
yosuwa:2:22: Abatasi basubirayo babatekerereza ibyo babonye22.Nuko baragenda bajya mu misozi bamarayo iminsi itatu, bageza aho ababagenjeje bahindukiriye, ariko bari babashatse inzira yose barabaheba.
yosuwa:2:23: 23.Nuko abo bagabo bombi baragaruka bamanuka umusozi, barambuka basanga Yosuwa mwene Nuni bamutekerereza ibyababayeho byose.
yosuwa:2:24: 24.Baramubwira bati “Ni ukuri koko, Uwiteka ashyize iki gihugu cyose mu maboko yacu, kandi bene cyo twabakuye umutima.”
yosuwa:3:1: Yosuwa ajya kuri Yorodani, Uwiteka amukomeza umutima1.Bukeye Yosuwa azinduka kare mu gitondo, avana i Shitimu n’Abisirayeli bose bagera kuri Yorodani, barara batambutse.
yosuwa:3:2: 2.Iminsi itatu ishize abatware banyura mu ngando hagati,
yosuwa:3:3: 3.bategeka abantu bati “Nimubona isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka Imana yanyu ihetswe n’Abalewi ari bo batambyi, muzahereko muhaguruke aho muri muyikurikire.
yosuwa:3:4: 4.Ariko hagati yanyu na yo hazaba intera y’imikono ibihumbi bibiri. Ntimuzayegere kugira ngo mumenye inzira mukwiriye gucamo, kuko ari nta bundi mwigeze guca muri iyi nzira.”
yosuwa:3:5: 5.Maze Yosuwa abwira abantu ati “Mwiyeze kuko ejo Uwiteka azakora ibitangaza muri mwe.”
yosuwa:3:6: 6.Nyuma Yosuwa abwira abatambyi ati “Nimuheke isanduku y’isezerano, mubanzirize abantu kwambuka.” Nuko baheka isanduku y’isezerano bajya imbere y’abantu.
yosuwa:3:7: 7.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Uyu munsi ndatangira kugukuza mu maso y’Abisirayeli bose, kugira ngo bamenye yuko ndi kumwe nawe nk’uko nabanaga na Mose.
yosuwa:3:8: 8.Ariko ubwire abatambyi bahetse isanduku y’isezerano uti ‘Nimugera ku nkombe ya Yorodani, mumanuke muhagararemo.’ ”
yosuwa:3:9: Yosuwa ategeka abantu, abakomeza9.Yosuwa abwira Abisirayeli ati “Nimunyegere mwumve amagambo y’Uwiteka Imana yanyu.”
yosuwa:3:10: 10.Yosuwa aherako aravuga ati “Iki ni cyo kizabamenyesha yuko Imana ihoraho iri muri mwe, kandi yuko itazabura kubaneshereza Abanyakanāni n’Abaheti, n’Abahivi n’Abaferizi, n’Abagirugashi n’Abamori n’Abayebusi.
yosuwa:3:11: 11.Nimwitegereze isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka nyir’isi yose, irababanziriza muri Yorodani.
yosuwa:3:12: 12.Nuko nimurobanure abagabo cumi na babiri mu miryango y’Abisirayeli, mu muryango wose havemo umuntu umwe umwe.
yosuwa:3:13: 13.Ibirenge by’abatambyi bahetse isanduku y’Uwiteka nyir’isi yose nibigera mu mazi ya Yorodani, amazi yo muri Yorodani ari bwigabanyemo kabiri, ayo haruguru arahīkubira ikirundo.”
yosuwa:3:14: Amazi ya Yorodani atandukana14.Nuko abantu bava mu mahema yabo, bakurikira abatambyi bahetse isanduku y’isezerano kugira ngo bambukane.
yosuwa:3:15: 15.Nuko abatambyi bahetse isanduku bageze kuri Yorodani, ibirenge byabo bigeze mu mazi -- kandi igihe cy’isarura amazi ya Yorodani arenga inkombe --
yosuwa:3:16: 16.amazi yo haruguru arahagarara yikubira ku mudugudu witwa Adamu hateganye n’i Saretani, kure y’aho bashakaga kwambukira, kandi ayo hepfo atembera mu nyanja yitwa Araba, ari yo Nyanja y’Umunyu, arashira. Nuko abantu barambuka baboneza i Yeriko.
yosuwa:3:17: 17.Abatambyi bahetse isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka bahagarara muri Yorodani hagati humutse neza hatanyerera, Abisirayeli bose bambukira ahumutse kugeza aho ubwoko bwose bwarangirije kwambuka Yorodani.
yosuwa:4:1: Batoranya abagabo bo gutora amabuye yo muri Yorodani1.Ubwoko bwose bumaze kwambuka Yorodani, Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati
yosuwa:4:2: 2.“Robanura muri aba bantu abagabo cumi na babiri, mu miryango yose havemo umwe umwe,
yosuwa:4:3: 3.ubategeke uti ‘Nimutore amabuye cumi n’abiri muri Yorodani hagati aho abatambyi bari bashinze ibirenge, muyambukane muyashyire aho mugandika iri joro.’ ”
yosuwa:4:4: 4.Yosuwa aherako ahamagaza abagabo cumi na babiri yarobanuye mu miryango y’Abisirayeli yose umwe umwe,
yosuwa:4:5: 5.arababwira ati “Nimunyure imbere y’isanduku y’Uwiteka Imana yanyu muri Yorodani hagati, umuntu wese aterura ibuye arishyire ku rutugu nk’uko umubare w’imiryango y’Abisirayeli ungana,
yosuwa:4:6: 6.kugira ngo bibe ikimenyetso muri mwe kera ubwo abana banyu bazabaza ba se bati ‘Aya mabuye ku bwanyu ni icyitegererezo ki?’
yosuwa:4:7: 7.Muzabasubize muti ‘Amazi ya Yorodani yatandukaniye imbere y’isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka, igihe yambukaga Yorodani amazi yayo agatandukana, kandi ayo mabuye azaba icyitegererezo cyibutsa Abisirayeli iteka ryose ibyabayeho.’ ”
yosuwa:4:8: 8.Nuko Abisirayeli bakora nk’uko Yosuwa yabategetse, batora amabuye cumi n’abiri muri Yorodani hagati nk’uko Uwiteka yategetse Yosuwa, bakurikije umubare w’imiryango y’Abisirayeli uko ungana, barayambukana bayageza aho bagiye kugandika bayaturaho.
yosuwa:4:9: 9.Yosuwa na we ashinga amabuye cumi n’abiri muri Yorodani hagati, aho abatambyi bahetse isanduku y’isezerano bari bashinze ibirenge, ni ho akiri na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:4:10: Bambuka, amazi ya Yorodani asubirana10.Nuko abatambyi bahetse isanduku bahagarara muri Yorodani hagati, kugeza igihe ibyo Uwiteka yategetse Yosuwa kubwira abantu byarangiriye nk’uko Mose yari yategetse Yosuwa byose. Nuko abantu barihuta barambuka.
yosuwa:4:11: 11.Ariko abantu bose bamaze guhita, isanduku y’Uwiteka ihetswe n’abatambyi irambutswa, abantu babireba.
yosuwa:4:12: 12.Abarubeni n’Abagadi n’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase, babanziriza Abisirayeli kwambuka bafite intwaro nk’uko Mose yari yarabategetse.
yosuwa:4:13: 13.Ingabo nk’inzovu enye zifite intwaro zinyura imbere y’Uwiteka mu kibaya cy’i Yeriko, ziteguye kurwana.
yosuwa:4:14: 14.Uwo munsi Uwiteka akuza Yosuwa mu maso y’Abisirayeli bose, baramwubaha nk’uko bubahaga Mose iminsi yose yamaze akiriho.
yosuwa:4:15: 15.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati
yosuwa:4:16: 16.“Tegeka abatambyi bahetse isanduku y’isezerano bave muri Yorodani.”
yosuwa:4:17: 17.Yosuwa ategeka abatambyi ati “Nimuzamuke muve muri Yorodani.”
yosuwa:4:18: 18.Abatambyi bahetse isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka bavuye muri Yorodani bashinze ibirenge imusozi, amazi ya Yorodani aherako arasubirana, asandara hose arenga inkombe nk’uko yari asanzwe.
yosuwa:4:19: 19.Abantu bazamuka bava muri Yorodani ku munsi wa cumi w’ukwezi kwa mbere, bagandika i Gilugali mu rugabano rw’i Yeriko mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba.
yosuwa:4:20: 20.Ya mabuye cumi n’abiri bakuye muri Yorodani Yosuwa ayashinga i Gilugali.
yosuwa:4:21: 21.Maze abwira Abisirayeli ati “Abana banyu ubwo bazabaza ba se mu gihe kizaza bati ‘Aya mabuye ni ay’iki?’
yosuwa:4:22: 22.Muzabigishe mubasobanurira muti ‘Abisirayeli bambutse Yorodani ikamye’,
yosuwa:4:23: 23.kuko Uwiteka Imana yanyu yakamije amazi ya Yorodani imbere yanyu kugeza aho mwambukiye, nk’uko Uwiteka Imana yanyu yagize Inyanja Itukura ubwo yayikamirije imbere yacu kugeza aho twambukiye,
yosuwa:4:24: 24.kugira ngo amahanga yose yo mu isi amenye ko Uwiteka agira amaboko akomeye, bajye batinya Uwiteka Imana yanyu iteka ryose.”
yosuwa:5:1: Yosuwa akebesha abantu1.Nuko abami bose b’Abamori bari hakuno ya Yorodani mu ruhande rw’iburengerazuba, n’abami b’Abanyakanāni bari ku nyanja, bumvise uko Uwiteka yagabanirije amazi ya Yorodani imbere y’Abisirayeli kugeza aho bambukiye, imitima yabo ishya ubwoba, bacika intege ku bw’Abisirayeli.
yosuwa:5:2: 2.Icyo gihe Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Wisaturire amabuye atyaye, mukebe Abisirayeli ubwa kabiri.”
yosuwa:5:3: 3.Yosuwa asatura amabuye atyaye, ayakebeshereza Abisirayeli ku musozi Araloti.
yosuwa:5:4: 4.Impamvu yatumye Yosuwa abakebesha ngiyi: abagabo bose bari baravuye muri Egiputa, bari baraguye mu nzira inyura mu butayu barimo ingabo zose, ni bo bari bavuye muri Egiputa.
yosuwa:5:5: 5.Abantu bose bari bavuyeyo bari barakebwe, ariko abo babyariye mu butayu bakiri mu nzira yaho ubwo bavaga muri Egiputa, bo bari batarakebwa
yosuwa:5:6: 6.kuko Abisirayeli bazerereye imyaka mirongo ine mu butayu, kugeza igihe ingabo zose z’ubwoko bwabo zavuye mu Egiputa zashiriye, kuko batumviye Uwiteka. Uwiteka yari yarabarahiye ko atazemera ko bareba igihugu Uwiteka yasezeraniye ba sekuruza babo kukibaha, ari cyo gihugu cy’amata n’ubuki.
yosuwa:5:7: 7.Abana babo yabashubije mu cyimbo cyabo, ari bo Yosuwa yakebesheje kuko bari batarakebwa, impamvu ni uko batakebewe mu nzira.
yosuwa:5:8: 8.Nuko abantu bose bamaze gukebwa baguma aho bari bari mu mahema yabo kugeza aho bakiriye.
yosuwa:5:9: 9.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “None mbakuyeho igisuzuguriro Abanyegiputa babasuzuguraga.” Ni cyo gituma aho hantu hitwa Gilugali na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:5:10: Baziririza ibya Pasika10.Nuko Abisirayeli babamba amahema i Gilugali, baziririza Pasika ku munsi wa cumi n’ine w’ukwezi nimugoroba, mu kibaya cy’i Yeriko.
yosuwa:5:11: 11.Bukeye bw’umunsi wa Pasika, uwo munsi nyine bawuryaho ibigugu by’ingano zo muri icyo gihugu, n’udutsima tutasembuwe n’ibigori bikaranze.
yosuwa:5:12: 12.Nuko bukeye bw’uwo munsi baririyeho ibigugu by’ingano zo muri icyo gihugu manu ntiyongera kuboneka. Abisirayeli ntibongera kubona manu ukundi, ahubwo uwo mwaka barya imyaka y’igihugu cy’i Kanāni.
yosuwa:5:13: Marayika abonekera Yosuwa13.Nuko Yosuwa yegereye i Yeriko yubura amaso abona umuntu uhagaze amwerekeye, afite inkota mu ntoki. Yosuwa aramwegera aramubaza ati “Mbese uri uwo mu bacu, cyangwa uwo mu babisha bacu?”
yosuwa:5:14: 14.Aramusubiza ati “Oya, ahubwo nje nonaha kubera ingabo z’Uwiteka umugaba.” Yosuwa yikubita hasi yubamye aramuramya, aramubaza ati “Mutware, jyewe umugaragu wawe untegetse iki?”
yosuwa:5:15: 15.Nuko umugaba w’ingabo z’Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Kwetura inkweto mu birenge byawe kuko aho uhagaze aha ari ahera.” Yosuwa abigenza atyo.
yosuwa:6:1: Imana ibwira Yosuwa uburyo bazazenguruka Yeriko1.I Yeriko hari hakinzwe cyane kuko batinyaga Abisirayeli, nta wasohokaga kandi nta winjiraga.
yosuwa:6:2: 2.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Dore nkugabije i Yeriko n’umwami waho n’intwari zaho.
yosuwa:6:3: 3.Namwe ab’ingabo mwese muzazenguruke umudugudu rimwe, abe ari ko muzajya mukora kumara iminsi itandatu.
yosuwa:6:4: 4.Kandi abatambyi barindwi bazatware amahembe arindwi y’amapfizi y’intama imbere y’isanduku, ku munsi wa karindwi muzazenguruke umudugudu karindwi, maze abatambyi bavuze imahembe.
yosuwa:6:5: 5.Amahembe navuga cyane mukumva amajwi yayo, abantu bose bazavugire icyarimwe baranguruye amajwi yabo, inkike z’amabuye zigose umudugudu zizaherako ziriduke, abantu bose bazurire, umuntu wese imbere ye.”
yosuwa:6:6: 6.Yosuwa mwene Nuni ahamagara abatambyi arababwira ati “Nimuheke isanduku y’isezerano, abatambyi barindwi bajyane amahembe arindwi y’amapfizi y’intama imbere y’isanduku y’Uwiteka.”
yosuwa:6:7: 7.Maze abwira abantu ati “Nimuhite muzenguruka umudugudu, n’abafite intwaro na bo bahite bajye imbere y’isanduku y’Uwiteka.”
yosuwa:6:8: 8.Nuko Yosuwa amaze kubwira abantu, abatambyi barindwi bajyana amahembe arindwi y’amapfizi y’intama banyura imbere y’Uwiteka bayavuza, isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka barayibakurikiza.
yosuwa:6:9: 9.Abafite intwaro bo bajya imbere y’abatambyi bavuza amahembe, n’ab’inyuma bakurikira isanduku, ba batambyi bakomeza kugenda bavuza amahembe.
yosuwa:6:10: 10.Yosuwa ategeka abantu arababwira ati “Ntimuzasakuze cyane ngo ijwi ryanyu ryumvikane, ntihakagire ijambo riva mu kanwa kanyu kugeza umunsi nzababwirira nti ‘Nimurangurure amajwi’, muzahereko muvuge.”
yosuwa:6:11: 11.Nuko azengurukana isanduku y’Uwiteka umudugudu rimwe, basubira mu mahema yabo bararamo.
yosuwa:6:12: 12.Nuko Yosuwa azinduka mu gitondo kare, abatambyi baheka isanduku y’Uwiteka,
yosuwa:6:13: 13.n’abatambyi barindwi bajyana amahembe arindwi y’amapfizi y’intama bajya imbere y’isanduku y’Uwiteka, bakomeza kugenda bayavuza, maze abafite intwaro bajya imbere, ab’inyuma bakurikira isanduku y’Uwiteka, bagenda bavuza amahembe.
yosuwa:6:14: 14.Ku munsi wa kabiri bazenguruka umudugudu rimwe basubira mu mahema yabo, bagenza batyo iminsi itandatu.
yosuwa:6:15: 15.Ku munsi wa karindwi bazinduka kare mu museke, bazenguruka umudugudu nk’uko bajyaga bagenza muri iyo minsi itandatu, ariko kuri uwo munsi ho bazenguruka umudugudu karindwi.
yosuwa:6:16: 16.Bagejeje ku ncuro ya karindwi abatambyi bakivuza amahembe, Yosuwa abwira abantu ati “Nimutere amajwi hejuru kuko Uwiteka abahaye umudugudu.
yosuwa:6:17: 17.Kandi umudugudu n’ibiwurimo byose bizashinganirwa Uwiteka, ariko maraya uwo Rahabu abe ari we uzarokokana n’abo mu nzu ye bose, kuko yari yarahishe ba batasi twoherezaga.
yosuwa:6:18: 18.Namwe muzīrinde mu buryo bwose ikintu cyose cyashinganywe, kuko nimugikoraho muzazanira urugerero rw’Abisirayeli umuvumo n’amakuba.
yosuwa:6:19: 19.Ariko ifeza yose n’izahabu, n’ibintu by’imiringa n’iby’icyuma byose byerejwe Uwiteka, bizajye mu bubiko bwe.”
yosuwa:6:20: Inkike z’i Yeriko ziriduka, bakiza Rahabu20.Abantu baherako barangurura amajwi abatambyi bakivuza amahembe, muri ako kanya abantu bumvise amajwi y’amahembe barangurura amajwi, inkike z’amabuye zirariduka, abantu barazamuka batera umudugudu, umuntu wese imbere ye barawutsinda.
yosuwa:6:21: 21.Barimbura rwose ibyari muri uwo mudugudu byose, abagabo n’abagore, abato n’abakuru, inka n’intama n’indogobe babyicisha inkota.
yosuwa:6:22: 22.Maze Yosuwa abwira ba bagabo babiri batataga igihugu ati “Nimwinjire mu nzu ya maraya uwo, musohore uwo mugore n’ibyo afite byose nk’uko mwamurahiye.”
yosuwa:6:23: 23.Nuko abo basore bari batase barinjira, basohora Rahabu na se na nyina na bene se, n’ibyo yari afite byose n’umuryango wabo wose, babishyira inyuma y’urugerero rw’Abisirayeli.
yosuwa:6:24: 24.Umudugudu barawutwika n’ibyarimo byose, keretse ifeza n’izahabu n’ibintu by’imiringa n’iby’ibyuma, kugira ngo bazabishyire mu nzu y’ububiko bw’Uwiteka.
yosuwa:6:25: 25.Nuko Yosuwa arokora maraya uwo Rahabu n’inzu ya se n’ibyo yari afite byose, aba mu Bisirayeli na bugingo n’ubu kuko yahishe za ntumwa Yosuwa yatumaga gutata i Yeriko.
yosuwa:6:26: Yosuwa avuma i Yeriko26.Icyo gihe Yosuwa arabihanangiriza arahira ati “Umuntu uzahaguruka akajya kūbaka uyu mudugudu w’i Yeriko, avumwe imbere y’Uwiteka. Igihe azubaka urufatiro rwaho azapfushe imfura ye, n’igihe azahaterera inzugi z’amarembo azapfushe umuhererezi we.”
yosuwa:6:27: 27.Nuko Uwiteka yabanaga na Yosuwa kandi arogera, byamamara mu gihugu cyose.
yosuwa:7:1: Abisirayeli batera kuri Ayi bakaneshwa1.Ariko Abisirayeli baracumura kuko benze ku byashinganywe: Akani mwene Karumi mwene Zabudi mwene Zera wo mu muryango wa Yuda, ni we wari wenze ku byashinganywe, Uwiteka arakarira Abisirayeli uburakari bwaka nk’umuriro.
yosuwa:7:2: 2.Nuko bavuye i Yeriko, Yosuwa atuma abantu kuri Ayi hafi y’i Betaveni iburasirazuba bw’i Beteli, arababwira ati “Nimugende mutate icyo gihugu.” Nuko abo bagabo bajya gutata kuri Ayi.
yosuwa:7:3: 3.Bagaruka aho Yosuwa ari baramubwira bati “Abantu bose ntibajyeyo, hagende nk’ibihumbi bibiri cyangwa bitatu, abe ari bo batera kuri Ayi. Ntiwirirwe uruhiriza abantu bose ubusa uboherezayo, kuko abaho ari bake.”
yosuwa:7:4: 4.Nuko abantu baragenda bari nk’ibihumbi bitatu, bagezeyo birukanwa n’abo kuri Ayi.
yosuwa:7:5: 5.Ariko abantu bo kuri Ayi babicamo abagabo nka mirongo itatu na batandatu, babavana imbere y’irembo ryabo babageza i Shebarimu babirukana ikijyepfo, nuko imitima y’abantu ishya ubwoba ihinduka nk’amazi.
yosuwa:7:6: Yosuwa arira, asobanuza Uwiteka impamvu zabyo6.Nuko Yosuwa abyumvise ashishimura imyenda ye, agwa yubamye imbere y’isanduku y’Uwiteka, ageza nimugoroba we n’abakuru b’Abisirayeli, bitera umukungugu mu mitwe.
yosuwa:7:7: 7.Nuko Yosuwa aravuga ati “Ayi we, Nyagasani Mana! Ni iki cyatumye wambutsa aba bantu Yorodani, ukaba udushyize mu maboko y’Abamori ngo baturimbure? Erega iyaba twarigumiye hakurya ya Yorodani!
yosuwa:7:8: 8.None Mana ndacyavuze iki, ubwo Abisirayeli bahaye ibitugu ababisha babo?
yosuwa:7:9: 9.Abanyakanāni n’abo mu gihugu cyose nibabyumva bazatugota, bazimanganye amazina yacu mu isi. None se, izina ryawe rikuru uzarirengera ute?”
yosuwa:7:10: 10.Nuko Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Byuka. Ni iki gitumye ugwa wubamye?
yosuwa:7:11: 11.Abisirayeli baracumuye kuko baciye ku itegeko ryanjye nabategetse, bagatwara ku bintu byashinganywe, bakabyiba bakirengagiza, ndetse bakabishyira mu bintu byabo.
yosuwa:7:12: 12.Icyo ni cyo cyatumye Abisirayeli batabasha guhagarara imbere y’ababisha babo bakabaha ibitugu, kuko bahindutse ibivume. Ndetse sinzongera kubana namwe ukundi, keretse murimbuye ikivume mukagikura muri mwe.
yosuwa:7:13: 13.Byuka wejeshe abantu uti ‘Mwiyereze umunsi w’ejo kuko Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli ivuze iti: Muri mwe hariho uwenze ku byashinganywe, Bisirayeli mwe? Ntimukibasha guhagarara imbere y’ababisha banyu, keretse mugaruye ibyari byashinganywe biri muri mwe.
yosuwa:7:14: 14.Mu gitondo muzaterane uko imiryango yanyu iri, nuko umuryango Uwiteka azarobanura uzaterane uko amazu yawo ari, maze inzu Uwiteka azarobanura izaterane uko imbyaro zayo ziri, kandi urubyaro Uwiteka azarobanura ruzaterane hazajye haza umuntu umwe umwe.
yosuwa:7:15: 15.Nuko uzafatanwa ibyashinganywe azatwikanwe n’ibyo afite byose, kuko yishe isezerano ry’Uwiteka agakora ishyano mu Bisirayeli.’ ”
yosuwa:7:16: Akani afatwa, abyatura, bamwica16.Yosuwa azinduka mu gitondo kare, ahamagaza Abisirayeli n’imiryango yabo uko iri, umuryango wa Yuda uratoranywa.
yosuwa:7:17: 17.Yigiza hafi amazu y’Abayuda afata inzu ya Zera, yigiza hafi inzu y’Abazera n’imbyaro zayo, afata Zabudi.
yosuwa:7:18: 18.Yigiza hafi urubyaro rwe umuntu umwe umwe, nuko Akani mwene Karumi mwene Zabudi mwene Zera wo mu muryango wa Yuda, arafatwa.
yosuwa:7:19: 19.Maze Yosuwa abwira Akani ati “Mwana wanjye, ndakwinginze wubahe Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli, uyāturire, maze umbwire nonaha icyo wakoze, ntumpishe.”
yosuwa:7:20: 20.Akani asubiza Yosuwa ati “Ni ukuri nacumuye ku Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli, uko nabigenje ni uku:
yosuwa:7:21: 21.nabonye mu minyago umwambaro mwiza wa Shinari, na shekeli z’ifeza magana abiri, n’umuhimba w’izahabu w’igipimo cya shekeli mirongo itatu, ndabyifuza mperako ndabyenda mbihisha mu gitaka, biri mu ihema ryanjye hagati, n’ifeza iri munsi yabyo.”
yosuwa:7:22: 22.Uwo mwanya Yosuwa yohereza intumwa, zigenda ziruka zihina mu ihema, zisanga bihishwe mu ihema rye n’ifeza iri munsi yabyo.
yosuwa:7:23: 23.Nuko babikuramo babizanira Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bose, babirambika imbere y’Uwiteka.
yosuwa:7:24: 24.Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bose bafata Akani mwene Zera, benda ifeza n’umwambaro n’umuhimba w’izahabu, n’abana be, abahungu n’abakobwa, n’inka ze n’indogobe ze n’intama ze, n’ihema rye n’ibyo yari afite byose babijyana mu gikombe cyitwa Akori.
yosuwa:7:25: 25.Bagezeyo Yosuwa aravuga ati “Ni iki cyatumye utugwa nabi? Nawe Uwiteka arakugwa nabi uyu munsi.” Abisirayeli bose bamutera amabuye, n’urubyaro rwe barutera amabuye maze barabatwika.
yosuwa:7:26: 26.Birangiye bamurundaho ikirundo kinini cy’amabuye, kiracyariho n’ubu. Nuko Uwiteka arīgarura, areka uburakari bwe bukaze. Nuko izina ry’icyo gikombe ni Akori na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:8:1: Yosuwa yigira inama yo gutera Ayi1.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Ntutinye kandi ntukuke umutima. Jyana ingabo zose uhaguruke utere kuri Ayi, umenye ko nshyize umwami waho n’abantu be n’umudugudu we n’igihugu cye mu maboko yawe.
yosuwa:8:2: 2.Uzagire Ayi n’umwami waho nk’uko wagize i Yeriko n’umwami waho, kandi iminyago yaho n’inka zaho uzabyitwarire bibe iminyago yanyu, nuko muzace igico inyuma y’umudugudu.”
yosuwa:8:3: 3.Maze Yosuwa ahagurukana n’ingabo ze zose ngo batere kuri Ayi. Yosuwa aherako atoranya abantu inzovu eshatu b’intwari kandi b’imbaraga, abohereza nijoro
yosuwa:8:4: 4.arabategeka ati “Mucire igico hafi y’umudugudu inyuma yawo, ntimujye kure yawo cyane, ahubwo mube mwiteguye.
yosuwa:8:5: 5.Nanjye n’abantu turi kumwe tuzegera umudugudu, nuko nibatuzira nk’ubwa mbere tuzaherako tubahunge.
yosuwa:8:6: 6.Na bo ntibazabura kudukurikira kuko tuzaba tubashutse, bave mu mudugudu wabo batugeze kure yawo bagire ngo turabahunze nk’ubwa mbere, natwe tuzakomeza guhunga imbere yabo.
yosuwa:8:7: 7.Namwe abari mu gico nimubona yuko bageze kure muzabyuke mutere uwo mudugudu, kuko Uwiteka Imana yanyu izaba iwubagabije.
yosuwa:8:8: 8.Nuko nimugera muri uwo mudugudu muzawutwike mukurikije ijambo ry’Uwiteka, ngiryo itegeko mbahaye.”
yosuwa:8:9: 9.Nuko Yosuwa abohereza aho bari bucire igico, bicara hagati y’i Beteli na Ayi iburengerazuba bwa Ayi, ariko iryo joro Yosuwa arara mu bantu.
yosuwa:8:10: Batera Ayi bayirimbura, bica umwami waho10.Mu gitondo kare Yosuwa arazinduka ateranya abantu, azamukana n’abakuru b’Abisirayeli abarangaje imbere, bajya kuri Ayi.
yosuwa:8:11: 11.Ingabo zose zari kumwe na we zirazamuka zegera uwo mudugudu zigira aho ziwitegeye, zigandika aho ikasikazi yo kuri Ayi, hariho igikombe hagati yaho na Ayi.
yosuwa:8:12: 12.Maze yohereza abantu inzovu ibihumbi bitanu, abategeka ko bacira igico hagati y’i Beteli na Ayi, iburengerazuba bw’umudugudu.
yosuwa:8:13: 13.Uko ni ko baciye abantu mu nteko, ingabo zose zari ikasikazi y’umudugudu, kandi abaciye igico bari iburengerazuba bwaho. Iryo joro Yosuwa ajya muri icyo gikombe hagati.
yosuwa:8:14: 14.Nuko umwami wa Ayi abibonye, abo mu mudugudu bazinduka bihuta basanganira Abisirayeli, bose bajyana n’umwami wabo kubarwaniriza ahategetswe iruhande rw’ikibaya, ariko ntiyamenya ko hari abamuciriye igico inyuma y’umudugudu.
yosuwa:8:15: 15.Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bose bihindura nk’abaneshejwe imbere yabo, bahungira mu nzira ijya mu butayu.
yosuwa:8:16: 16.Bateranya aba Ayi bose ngo bakurikire Yosuwa, nuko baramukurikira ariko barashukashukwa ngo bave mu mudugudu.
yosuwa:8:17: 17.Ntihagira umugabo usigara muri Ayi cyangwa i Beteli ataje kwirukana Abisirayeli, basiga umudugudu wuguruwe barabakurikira.
yosuwa:8:18: 18.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Tunga kuri Ayi icumu ryawe kuko ngiye kuyikugabiza.” Yosuwa atunga kuri Ayi icumu yari afite mu ntoki.
yosuwa:8:19: 19.Arambuye ukuboko kwe, abari mu gico babyuka aho bari bari, birukanka binjira mu mudugudu barawutsinda, bahita bawutwika.
yosuwa:8:20: 20.Aba Ayi bakebutse inyuma babona umwotsi w’umudugudu utumbagiye hejuru, bituma bananirwa guhunga babura epfo na ruguru, abari bahungiye mu butayu barabahindukirana.
yosuwa:8:21: 21.Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bose babonye ko abari baciye igico batsinze umudugudu, kandi ko umwotsi wawo utumbagira, bagaruka bica aba Ayi umugenda.
yosuwa:8:22: 22.Abari bateye umudugudu bawuvamo bakubira aba Ayi hagati, babaturuka hirya no hino barabica, ntihagira n’umwe ucika ku icumu.
yosuwa:8:23: 23.Umwami wa Ayi bamufata mpiri, bamuzanira Yosuwa.
yosuwa:8:24: 24.Nuko Abisirayeli barangije kwicira aba Ayi ku misozi no mu butayu aho babakurikiye, bamaze kubicisha inkota bose kugeza aho bashiriye, Abisirayeli bose bagaruka kuri Ayi baharimbuza inkota.
yosuwa:8:25: 25.Nuko abantu ba Ayi bapfuye uwo munsi, abagabo n’abagore bari inzovu n’ibihumbi bibiri.
yosuwa:8:26: 26.Yosuwa ntiyagarura ukuboko yatungishije icumu, kugeza ubwo yamaze kurimbura aba Ayi bose,
yosuwa:8:27: 27.keretse inka n’iminyango by’uwo mudugudu, Abisirayeli babyijyanira ho iminyago nk’uko Uwiteka yasezeranije Yosuwa.
yosuwa:8:28: 28.Nuko Yosuwa atwika Ayi, ayihindura ibirundo by’amatongo na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:8:29: 29.Umwami wa Ayi we amumanika ku giti kugeza nimugoroba, izuba rigiye kurenga Yosuwa ategeka abantu ngo bamanure intumbi ye bayijugunye imbere y’irembo ry’umudugudu, bayirundaho amabuye bayagira ikirundo kinini, kiracyariho na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:8:30: Yosuwa yubaka igicaniro, yandika amategeko ku mabuye30.Birangiye Yosuwa yubakira Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli igicaniro cy’amabuye ku musozi witwa Ebali,
yosuwa:8:31: 31.nk’uko Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yategetse Abisirayeli, kandi uko byanditswe mu gitabo cy’amategeko ya Mose, igicaniro cy’amabuye mazima atigeze gukozwaho icyuma n’umuntu n’umwe, bagitambiraho Uwiteka ibitambo byoswa n’ibitambo by’ishimwe yuko bari amahoro.
yosuwa:8:32: 32.Maze yandikira imbere y’Abisirayeli ku mabuye y’igicaniro amategeko ya Mose, nk’uko Mose yari yarayanditse.
yosuwa:8:33: 33.Abisirayeli bose n’abakuru babo n’abatware babo n’abacamanza babo, bahagarara hirya no hino y’isanduku imbere y’Abalewi b’abatambyi bahekaga isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka, si imbyaro zabo gusa ahubwo n’abanyamahanga. Igice cyabo cyari gihagaze ahagana ku musozi Gerizimu, ikindi gice ahagana ku musozi Ebali, nk’uko Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yabategetse ubwa mbere gusabira Abisirayeli umugisha.
yosuwa:8:34: 34.Hanyuma asoma amagambo y’amategeko yose, imigisha n’imivumo nk’uko byari byanditswe byose mu gitabo cy’amategeko.
yosuwa:8:35: 35.Nta jambo na rimwe mu yo Mose yategetse yose Yosuwa atasomeye imbere y’iteraniro rya Isirayeli, harimo abagore n’abana n’abanyamahanga bagendanaga na bo.
yosuwa:9:1: Abagibeyoni bigira inama zo kwikiza barahanwa1.Nuko abami bose bo hakuno ya Yorodani, bo mu misozi no mu bibaya no mu mpande z’Inyanja Nini ahagana i Lebanoni, Abaheti n’Abamori n’Abanyakanāni, n’Abaferizi n’Abahivi n’Abayebusi babyumvise,
yosuwa:9:2: 2.bateranira hamwe bahuza inama yo kurwanya Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli.
yosuwa:9:3: 3.Ariko Abagibeyoni bumvise ibyo Yosuwa yakoze i Yeriko no kuri Ayi,
yosuwa:9:4: 4.bahimba ubwenge baragenda bīhindura intumwa, bajyana amasaho ashaje ku ndogobe zabo, n’imvumba za vino zishaje ziteye ibiremo zibaririye,
yosuwa:9:5: 5.bambaye inkweto mu birenge zishaje ziteye indomo, n’imyenda ishaje y’ubushwambagara, kandi imitsima yose y’impamba yari yaragwengeye iguye uruhumbu.
yosuwa:9:6: 6.Barahaguruka basanga Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli mu ngando y’i Gilugali barababwira bati “Turaturuka mu gihugu cya kure, nuko mudusezeranye isezerano.”
yosuwa:9:7: 7.Nuko Abisirayeli basubiza Abahivi bati “Ahari muri abaturanyi bacu. None twabasha dute gusezerana namwe?”
yosuwa:9:8: 8.Babwira Yosuwa bati “Turi abagaragu bawe.” Yosuwa arababaza ati “Muri bwoko ki? Muturuka he?”
yosuwa:9:9: 9.Baramusubiza bati “Twebwe abagaragu bawe turaturuka mu gihugu cya kure, twazanywe ino n’izina ry’Uwiteka Imana yawe, kuko twumvise kwamamara kwayo n’ibyo yakoze muri Egiputa byose,
yosuwa:9:10: 10.n’ibyo yakoreye abami babiri b’Abamori bo hakurya ya Yorodani, Sihoni umwami w’i Heshiboni, na Ogi umwami w’i Bashani wari muri Ashitaroti.
yosuwa:9:11: 11.Nuko abakuru bacu n’abari mu gihugu cyacu bose baratubwira bati ‘Nimujyane impamba y’urugendo mujye kubasanganira mubabwire muti: Turi abagaragu banyu none mudusezeranye isezerano.’
yosuwa:9:12: 12.Kandi iyi mitsima yacu, twayihambiriye mu mazu y’iwacu igishyushye umunsi duhaguruka tukaza kubareba, none yaragwengeye iguye uruhumbu,
yosuwa:9:13: 13.kandi n’izi mvumba twazujuje vino zikiri nshya none dore ziratobaguritse, imyambaro n’inkweto bidusaziyeho ku bw’urugendo rurerure cyane.”
yosuwa:9:14: 14.Abisirayeli bemezwa n’ibyokurya byabo batabishobanuje Uwiteka.
yosuwa:9:15: 15.Nuko Yosuwa asezerana na bo isezerano ry’amahoro no kutazabica, n’abatware b’iteraniro barabarahira.
yosuwa:9:16: 16.Nuko iminsi itatu ishize bamaze gusezerana na bo, bumva ko ari abaturanyi babo kandi ko batuye hagati yabo.
yosuwa:9:17: 17.Abisirayeli baragenda bagera mu midugudu yabo ku munsi wa gatatu. Imidugudu yabo yari i Gibeyoni n’i Kefira, n’i Bēroti n’i Kiriyatiyeyarimu.
yosuwa:9:18: 18.Abisirayeli ntibabica kuko abatware b’iteraniro bari barabarahiye Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli, iteraniro ryose ryitotombera abatware.
yosuwa:9:19: 19.Ariko abatware bose babwira iteraniro bati “Twabarahiye Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli, ntitwabasha kubākura
yosuwa:9:20: 20.ahubwo tubagire dutya: tubasige ari bazima kugira ngo uburakari butatubaho ku bwa ya ndahiro twabarahiye.”
yosuwa:9:21: 21.Abatware barababwira bati “Nimubareke ari bazima, mubagire abashenyi n’abavomyi b’iteraniro ryose nk’uko twababwiye.”
yosuwa:9:22: 22.Nuko Yosuwa arabahamagaza arababaza ati “Ni iki cyatumye muturyarya mukavuga yuko muri kure yacu cyane, kandi duturanye?
yosuwa:9:23: 23.Nuko rero muravumwe, ntabwo muzabura kuba abaretwa n’abashenyi n’abavomyi b’inzu y’Imana yanjye.”
yosuwa:9:24: 24.Basubiza Yosuwa bati “Erega abagaragu bawe twabwiwe neza yuko Uwiteka Imana yawe, yategetse Mose umugaragu wayo kubaha igihugu cyose no kurimbura bene igihugu ngo bashire imbere yanyu. Ni cyo cyatumye tubatinya cyane ku bw’amagara yacu tugakora dutyo.
yosuwa:9:25: 25.None dore turi mu maboko yawe, icyo ushima ko ari cyiza kigutunganiye abe ari cyo udukorera.”
yosuwa:9:26: 26.Nuko abagirira atyo, abakiza amaboko y’Abisirayeli ntibabica.
yosuwa:9:27: 27.Yosuwa abagira abashenyi n’abavomyi b’iteraniro n’ab’igicaniro cy’Uwiteka, aho azatoranya hose. Ni ko bagikora na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:10:1: Barwanya abandi bami batanu, bo baterwa n’urubura1.Ubwo Adonisedeki umwami w’i Yerusalemu yumvise uko Yosuwa yatsinze Ayi akaharimbura rwose, kandi uko yagize kuri Ayi n’umwami waho nk’uko yagize i Yeriko n’umwami waho, kandi uko Abagibeyoni basezeranye amahoro n’Abisirayeli bakabana na bo,
yosuwa:10:2: 2.aherako aratinya cyane kuko i Gibeyoni hari umudugudu ukomeye cyane, nk’uko indembo z’abami zimera ndetse harutaga kuri Ayi, n’abagabo baho bose bari intwari.
yosuwa:10:3: 3.Ni cyo cyatumye Adonisedeki umwami w’i Yerusalemu atuma kuri Hohamu umwami w’i Heburoni no kuri Piramu umwami w’i Yaramuti, no kuri Yafiya umwami w’i Lakishi no kuri Debira umwami wo kuri Eguloni ati
yosuwa:10:4: 4.“Nimuzamuke munsange, muntabare tuneshe Abagibeyoni kuko basezeranye amahoro na Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli.”
yosuwa:10:5: 5.Nuko abo bami batanu b’Abamori: umwami w’i Yerusalemu n’uw’i Heburoni n’uw’i Yaramuti, n’uw’i Lakishi n’uwo kuri Eguloni bateranira hamwe, barazamuka bo n’ingabo zabo zose bagandikira i Gibeyoni, barahagerereza.
yosuwa:10:6: 6.Nuko Abagibeyoni batuma kuri Yosuwa mu ngerero z’i Gilugali bati “Ntuhemukire abagaragu bawe, uzamuke n’ingoga uze utuvune uturengere, kuko abami bose b’Abamori bo ku misozi miremire bateraniye hamwe kudutera.”
yosuwa:10:7: 7.Nuko Yosuwa ahagurukana n’ingabo zose n’ab’intwari bakomeye bose, bava i Gilugali.
yosuwa:10:8: 8.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Ntubatinye kuko mbakugabije, nta muntu wo muri bo uzaguhagarara imbere.”
yosuwa:10:9: 9.Maze Yosuwa abatungukiraho vuba, kuko yaje ijoro ryose avuye i Gilugali.
yosuwa:10:10: 10.Uwiteka abatataniriza imbere y’Abisirayeli, babicira i Gibeyoni barabatikiza, babirukanira mu nzira izamuka ijya i Betihoroni, barabanesha babageza kuri Azeka n’i Makeda.
yosuwa:10:11: 11.Nuko bagihunga Abisirayeli bamanukira i Betihoroni, Uwiteka amanura amabuye manini y’urubura avuye mu ijuru, agenda abahondagura barinda bagera kuri Azeka. Nuko barapfa, abishwe n’urubura barutaga abo Abisirayeli bicishije inkota.
yosuwa:10:12: Izuba rihagarara umunsi wose, ntiryarenga12.Umunsi Uwiteka yagabijeho Abisirayeli Abamori, Yosuwa abwirira Uwiteka imbere y’Abisirayeli ati “Zuba, hagarara kuri Gibeyoni, Nawe Kwezi, hagarara mu gikombe cyo kuri Ayaloni.”
yosuwa:10:13: 13.Izuba riherako rirahagarara n’ukwezi kuguma aho kuri, bigeza aho ubwo bwoko bwamariye guhōra inzigo ababisha babo. Mbese icyo nticyanditswe mu gitabo cya Yashari? Izuba riguma mu ijuru hagati ritinda kurenga, rimara nk’umunsi wose.
yosuwa:10:14: 14.Kandi nta munsi wahwanye n’uwo mu yawubanjirije cyangwa mu yawukurikiye, ubwo Uwiteka yumvaga umuntu kuko Uwiteka ari we warwaniye Abisirayeli.
yosuwa:10:15: 15.Yosuwa aherako atabarukana n’Abisirayeli bose mu ngerero z’i Gilugali.
yosuwa:10:16: Bica abo bami16.Abo bami batanu barahunga, bihisha mu buvumo bw’i Makeda.
yosuwa:10:17: 17.Babwira Yosuwa bati “Twabonye abo bami batanu bihisha mu buvumo bw’i Makeda.”
yosuwa:10:18: 18.Nuko Yosuwa aravuga ati “Muhirike amabuye manini muyashyire ku muryango w’ubuvumo, mushyireho n’abo kubarinda.”
yosuwa:10:19: 19.Ati “Ariko ntimuhatinde, mukurikire ababisha banyu mubakubite muhere ku b’inyuma, ntimubakundire kwinjira mu midugudu yabo kuko Uwiteka Imana yanyu ibabagabije.”
yosuwa:10:20: 20.Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bamaze kubatikiza kugeza aho bashiriye, abasigaye muri bo binjira mu midugudu igoswe n’inkike z’amabuye.
yosuwa:10:21: 21.Abantu bose baherako bagaruka amahoro kuri Yosuwa mu ngando z’i Makeda. Nta muntu n’umwe watinyutse gutuka uwo mu Bisirayeli.
yosuwa:10:22: 22.Nuko Yosuwa aherako aravuga ati “Nimusibure umuryango w’ubuvumo, mukuremo abo bami batanu mubanzanire.”
yosuwa:10:23: 23.Bakora uko bategetswe basohora abo bami batanu, barabamuzanira babakuye muri bwa buvumo: umwami w’i Yerusalemu n’umwami w’i Heburoni n’umwami w’i Yaramuti, n’umwami w’i Lakishi n’umwami wo kuri Eguloni.
yosuwa:10:24: 24.Bamaze gukuramo abo bami babashyira Yosuwa. Yosuwa ahamagaza abagabo b’Abisirayeli bose, abwira abatware b’ingabo bajyanye na we ati “Nimuze munyegere mukandagire ku majosi y’aba bami.” Barabegera babakandagira ku majosi.
yosuwa:10:25: 25.Yosuwa arababwira ati “Ntimutinye kandi ntimukuke umutima, mube intwari kuko Uwiteka azagira atya ababisha banyu bose muzarwana.”
yosuwa:10:26: 26.Maze Yosuwa akubita abo bami arabica, abamanika ku biti bitanu. Nuko baguma ku biti kugeza nimugoroba.
yosuwa:10:27: 27.Izuba rirenze Yosuwa ategeka ko babamanura ku biti, babajugunya muri bwa buvumo bari bihishemo, ku muryango wabwo bahasibisha amabuye manini birinda bigeza na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:10:28: Bahindūra imidugudu yabo28.Uwo munsi Yosuwa atsinda i Makeda, abicisha inkota n’umwami waho abarimbura bose pe, ntiyasigaza n’umwe mu bari bawurimo bose kandi agira umwami w’i Makeda nk’uko yagize umwami w’i Yeriko.
yosuwa:10:29: 29.Bukeye Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bose bava i Makeda, batera i Libuna baraharwanya.
yosuwa:10:30: 30.Uwiteka agabiza Abisirayeli uwo mudugudu na wo n’umwami wawo babicisha inkota, ntiyasigaza n’umwe mu bari bawurimo bose kandi agira umwami waho nk’uko yagize umwami w’i Yeriko.
yosuwa:10:31: 31.Bukeye Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bose bava i Libuna batera i Lakishi, bagandikayo baraharwanya.
yosuwa:10:32: 32.Uwiteka agabiza Abisirayeli Lakishi bahatsinda ku munsi wa kabiri, bicisha inkota abari bawurimo bose nk’uko yagenje iby’i Libuna byose.
yosuwa:10:33: 33.Maze Horamu umwami w’i Gezeri ahagurutswa no gutabara i Lakishi, Yosuwa amwicana n’abantu be bose ntiyasigaza n’umwe.
yosuwa:10:34: 34.Bukeye Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli bose bava i Lakishi batera kuri Eguloni, barahagerereza baraharwanya.
yosuwa:10:35: 35.Uwo munsi barahatsinda bicisha inkota abari bahari bose, arabarimbura rwose nk’uko yagenje iby’i Lakishi byose.
yosuwa:10:36: 36.Bukeye Yosuwa azamukana n’Abisirayeli bose bava kuri Eguloni, batera i Heburoni baraharwanya.
yosuwa:10:37: 37.Barahatsinda bicisha inkota umwami waho n’imidugudu yaho yose n’abari bayirimo bose, ntiyasigaza n’umwe muri bo nk’uko yagenje ibyo kuri Eguloni byose, aharimburana n’abari bahari bose pe.
yosuwa:10:38: 38.Maze Yosuwa agarukana n’Abisirayeli bose, batera i Debira baraharwanya
yosuwa:10:39: 39.barahatsinda, maze umwami waho n’imidugudu yaho babicisha inkota barimbura abari bayirimo bose pe, ntiyasigaza n’umwe muri bo nk’uko yagize i Debira n’umwami waho, nk’uko yagize i Heburoni kandi nk’uko yagize i Libuna n’umwami waho.
yosuwa:10:40: 40.Uko ni ko Yosuwa yateye igihugu cyose cy’imisozi miremire n’icy’ikusi, n’icy’ikibaya n’icy’imirenge y’imisozi n’abami babyo ntiyasigaza n’umwe. Arimbura abahumeka bose pe, nk’uko Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli yategetse.
yosuwa:10:41: 41.Yosuwa arabica uhereye i Kadeshi y’i Baruneya ukageza n’i Gaza, n’igihugu cyose cy’i Gosheni kugeza n’i Gibeyoni.
yosuwa:10:42: 42.Nuko abo bami bose n’ibihugu byabo Yosuwa abaneshereza icyarimwe, kuko Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli yabarwaniye.
yosuwa:10:43: 43.Nuko Yosuwa atabarukana n’Abisirayeli bose, basubira mu ngerero z’i Gilugali.
yosuwa:11:1: Yabini ahamagaza abandi bami ngo bamutabare kurwanya Abisirayeli1.Yabini umwami w’i Hasori abyumvise, atumira Yobabu umwami w’i Madoni n’umwami w’i Shimuroni n’umwami wo kuri Akishafu,
yosuwa:11:2: 2.n’abami b’ikasikazi mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire, n’abo muri Araba ikusi h’i Kinereti, n’abo mu kibaya no mu misozi y’i Dori iburengerazuba.
yosuwa:11:3: 3.Maze atumira Abanyakanāni b’iburasirazuba n’ab’iburengerazuba, n’Abamori n’Abaheti n’Abaferizi n’Abayebusi bo mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire, n’Abahivi bo munsi y’i Herumoni mu gihugu cy’i Misipa.
yosuwa:11:4: 4.Nuko batabarana n’ingabo zabo zose, zari nyinshi zingana n’umusenyi wo mu kibaya cy’inyanja, n’amafarashi n’amagare menshi cyane.
yosuwa:11:5: 5.Abo bami bose baraterana, baraza bagandika hamwe ku mazi y’i Meromu ngo barwanye Abisirayeli.
yosuwa:11:6: 6.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati “Ntubatinye kuko ejo nk’iki gihe nzabatanga bose bicirwe imbere y’Abisirayeli, amafarashi yabo muzayateme ibitsi, n’amagare yabo muzayatwike.”
yosuwa:11:7: 7.Yosuwa azana n’ingabo zose, zibaterera ku mazi y’i Meromu zibaguye gitumo.
yosuwa:11:8: 8.Uwiteka abagabiza Abisirayeli barabakubita, barabirukana babageza kuri Sidoni nini n’i Misirefotimayimu, no mu gikombe cy’i Misipa iburasirazuba, barabica ntibasiga n’umwe.
yosuwa:11:9: 9.Yosuwa abagenza nk’uko Uwiteka yamutegetse, amafarashi yabo ayaca ibitsi, n’amagare yabo arayatwika.
yosuwa:11:10: 10.Icyo gihe Yosuwa asubira inyuma atsinda i Hasori, yicisha umwami waho inkota, kuko mbere hose Hasori hari umurwa w’umwami ukomeye muri abo bami bose.
yosuwa:11:11: 11.Bicisha inkota abari barimo bose barabarimbura pe, nta n’umwe wasigaye agihumeka, n’i Hasori arahatwika.
yosuwa:11:12: 12.N’indembo zose z’abo bami Yosuwa arazisenya, n’abami bose abicisha inkota. Arabarimbura rwose nk’uko Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yategetse.
yosuwa:11:13: 13.Ariko imidugudu yubatswe ku tununga nta n’umwe Abisirayeli batwitse, keretse i Hasori honyine ni ho Yosuwa yatwitse.
yosuwa:11:14: 14.N’iminyago yose y’iyo midugudu n’inka zose Abisirayeli babyijyanira ho iminyago, ariko umuntu wese bamwicisha inkota kugeza aho barimbukiye bose, ntibasigaza n’umwe ugihumeka.
yosuwa:11:15: 15.Nk’uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose umugaragu we ni ko Mose yategetse Yosuwa, Yosuwa na we abigenza atyo. Nta kintu na kimwe yaretse mu byo Uwiteka yategetse Mose byose.
yosuwa:11:16: Yosuwa arangiza guhindūra igihugu cyose16.Uko ni ko Yosuwa yahindūye icyo gihugu cyose cy’imisozi miremire, n’icy’ikusi cyose n’icy’i Gosheni cyose, n’icy’ikibaya n’icya Araba n’igihugu cy’imisozi miremire cya Isirayeli n’icy’ikibaya cyaho,
yosuwa:11:17: 17.uhereye ku musozi Halaki ukazamuka ujya i Seyiri, kugeza i Bāligadi mu mubande w’i Lebanoni uri munsi y’umusozi wa Herumoni. N’abami bacyo bose arabafata arabasogota arabica.
yosuwa:11:18: 18.Yosuwa arwana n’abo bami bose igihe kirekire.
yosuwa:11:19: 19.Nta mudugudu wigeze gusezerana amahoro n’Abisirayeli, keretse Abahivi batuye i Gibeyoni, iyindi midugudu yose bayitsinze barwanye.
yosuwa:11:20: 20.Ibyo byaturutse ku Uwiteka kuko yanangiraga imitima yabo bakaza kurwana n’Abisirayeli, yagiraga ngo abarimbure pe batagirirwa imbabazi, ahubwo barimburwe nk’uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose.
yosuwa:11:21: 21.Icyo gihe Yosuwa araza amaramo Abānaki mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire, n’ab’i Heburoni n’ab’i Debira, n’abo muri Anabu n’abo mu gihugu cyose cy’imisozi miremire ya Yuda, n’abo mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire ya Isirayeli, Yosuwa arabarimbura rwose n’imidugudu yabo.
yosuwa:11:22: 22.Nta muntu n’umwe wo mu Bānaki wasigaye mu gihugu cy’Abisirayeli, keretse i Gaza n’i Gati na Ashidodi, ni ho hasigaye bamwe.
yosuwa:11:23: 23.Uko ni ko Yosuwa yahindūye igihugu cyose nk’uko Uwiteka yabwiye Mose. Maze Yosuwa akigabira Abisirayeli kuba gakondo yabo, akurikiranya imiryango yabo. Nuko igihugu gihabwa ihumure.
yosuwa:12:1: Amazina y’abami baneshejwe na Yosuwa1.Aba ni bo bami b’ibihugu Abisirayeli barwanije bagahindūra ibihugu byabo hakurya ya Yorodani iburasirazuba, uhereye ku kibaya cya Arunoni ukageza ku musozi wa Herumoni, no muri Araba yose iburasirazuba.
yosuwa:12:2: 2.Igihugu cya Sihoni umwami w’Abamori wabaga i Heshiboni, agatwara Aroweri mu ruhande rw’ikibaya cya Arunoni n’umudugudu wari hagati mu kibaya, n’igice cy’i Galeyadi kugeza ku mugezi Yaboki mu rugabano rw’Abamoni.
yosuwa:12:3: 3.Kandi uhereye muri Araba ukageza ku ruzi rwa Kinereti iburasirazuba no ku nyanja ya Araba, ari yo Nyanja y’Umunyu mu nzira y’iburasirazuba ijya i Betiyeshimoti urugabano rwacyo rw’iruhande rw’ikusi rwanyuraga munsi y’imirenge y’imisozi Pisiga.
yosuwa:12:4: 4.Kandi ahindūra n’igihugu cya Ogi umwami w’i Bashani wo mu Barafa bacitse ku icumu, babaga muri Ashitaroti no muri Edureyi.
yosuwa:12:5: 5.Ni we watwaraga umusozi wa Herumoni n’i Saleka n’i Bashani yose kugeza mu rugabano rw’Abanyageshuri n’Abanyamāka, igice cy’i Galeyadi kugeza ku rugabano rwa Sihoni umwami w’i Heshiboni.
yosuwa:12:6: 6.Abo bose Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka n’Abisirayeli barabishe, kandi Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka ahaha Abarubeni n’Abagadi n’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase ngo habe ahabo.
yosuwa:12:7: 7.Kandi aba ni bo bari abami b’ibihugu byo hakuno ya Yorodani iburengerazuba, abo Yosuwa n’Abisirayeli banesheje, uhereye i Bāligadi mu kibaya cy’i Lebanoni ukageza ku musozi wa Halaki uzamuka i Seyiri. Yosuwa agiha imiryango y’Abisirayeli ngo habe ahabo nk’uko bagabanijwe.
yosuwa:12:8: 8.Igihugu cy’imisozi miremire n’icy’ikibaya n’icyo muri Araba, n’icy’imirenge y’imisozi n’icyo mu butayu n’icyo mu ruhande rw’ikusi, n’icy’Abaheti n’icy’Abamori n’icy’Abanyakanāni, n’icy’Abaferizi n’icy’Abahivi n’icy’Abayebusi.
yosuwa:12:9: 9.Abo bami ni aba: umwe ni umwami w’i Yeriko, undi ni umwami wo muri Ayi hateganye n’i Beteli,
yosuwa:12:10: 10.undi ni umwami w’i Yerusalemu, undi ni umwami w’i Heburoni,
yosuwa:12:11: 11.undi ni umwami w’i Yaramuti, undi ni umwami w’i Lakishi,
yosuwa:12:12: 12.undi ni umwami wo muri Eguloni, undi ni umwami w’i Gezeri,
yosuwa:12:13: 13.undi ni umwami w’i Debira, undi ni umwami w’i Gederi,
yosuwa:12:14: 14.undi ni umwami w’i Horuma, undi ni umwami wo muri Arada,
yosuwa:12:15: 15.undi ni umwami w’i Libuna, undi ni umwami wo muri Adulamu,
yosuwa:12:16: 16.undi ni umwami w’i Makeda, undi ni umwami w’i Beteli,
yosuwa:12:17: 17.undi ni umwami w’i Tapuwa, undi ni umwami w’i Heferi,
yosuwa:12:18: 18.undi ni umwami wo muri Afeka, ndi ni umwami w’i Sharoni,
yosuwa:12:19: 19.undi ni umwami w’i Madoni, undi ni umwami w’i Hasori,
yosuwa:12:20: 20.undi ni umwami w’i Shimuronimeroni, undi ni umwami wo muri Akishafu,
yosuwa:12:21: 21.undi ni umwami w’i Tānaki, undi ni umwami w’i Megido,
yosuwa:12:22: 22.undi ni umwami w’i Kedeshi, undi ni umwami w’i Yokineyamu y’i Karumeli,
yosuwa:12:23: 23.undi ni umwami w’i Dori mu misozi y’i Dori, undi ni umwami w’i Goyimu y’i Gilugali,
yosuwa:12:24: 24.undi ni umwami w’i Tirusa. Nuko abami bose bari mirongo itatu n’umwe.
yosuwa:13:1: Yosuwa ababwira ibice by’ibihugu bitarahindūrwa1.Yosuwa ashaje ageze mu za bukuru Uwiteka aramubwira ati “Urashaje ugeze mu za bukuru, ariko hasigaye ibihugu byinshi cyane bikwiriye guhindūrwa.
yosuwa:13:2: 2.Igihugu gisigaye ngiki kirimo ibi bihugu: iby’Abafilisitiya n’iby’Abanyageshuri byose,
yosuwa:13:3: 3.uhereye ku kagezi Shihori kari imbere ya Egiputa ukageza mu rugabano rwo kuri Ekuroni ikasikazi, habarirwa Abanyakanāni. Kandi abatware batanu b’Abafilisitiya ni aba: uw’Abanyagaza n’uw’Abanyashidodi n’uw’Abanyashikeloni, n’uw’Abanyagati n’uw’Abanyekuroni hamwe n’Abawi.
yosuwa:13:4: 4.Kandi ikusi igihugu cyose cy’Abanyakanāni, n’i Meyara h’Abasidoni ukageza kuri Afika mu rugabano rw’Abamori,
yosuwa:13:5: 5.n’igihugu cy’Abagebali n’i Lebanoni yose herekeye iburasirazuba, uhereye i Bāligadi munsi y’umusozi wa Herumoni ukageza aho i Hamati harasukirwa.
yosuwa:13:6: 6.Hariho n’abanyagihugu cy’imisozi miremire, uhereye i Lebanoni ukageza i Misirefotimayimu n’Abasidoni bose.” Ati “Nzabirukanira imbere y’Abisirayeli, maze uzahagabanye Abisirayeli habe gakondo yabo nk’uko nagutegetse.
yosuwa:13:7: 7.Nuko none iki gihugu ukigabanye ya miryango cyenda n’igice cy’uwa Manase.”
yosuwa:13:8: 8.Kuko Abarubeni n’Abagadi bahanywe na Manase gakondo yabo hakurya ya Yorodani iburasirasuba nk’uko Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yabahaye,
yosuwa:13:9: 9.uhereye kuri Aroweri mu ruhande rw’ikibaya cya Arunoni n’umudugudu wo hagati mu kibaya, n’igitwa cyose cy’i Medeba ukageza i Diboni,
yosuwa:13:10: 10.n’imidugudu yose ya Sihoni umwami w’Abamori watwaraga i Heshiboni kugeza ku rugabano rw’Abamoni,
yosuwa:13:11: 11.n’i Galeyadi no mu ngabano z’Abanyageshuri n’Abanyamāka, n’umusozi wose wa Herumoni n’i Bashani yose ukageza i Saleka,
yosuwa:13:12: 12.n’igihugu cyose cya Ogi cy’i Bashani watwaraga mu Ashitaroti no muri Edureyi (Ogi uwo ni we wo mu bacitse ku icumu mu Barafa). Abo ni bo Mose yarwanije akabirukana.
yosuwa:13:13: 13.Nyamara Abisirayeli bo ntibirukanye Abanyageshuri cyangwa Abanyamāka, ahubwo Abanyageshuri n’Abanyamāka baturana n’Abisirayeli na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:13:14: 14.Ariko umuryango w’Abalewi wo nta gakondo Mose yabahaye, keretse ibitambo byoswa by’Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli, ni byo gakondo yabo nk’uko yamubwiye.
yosuwa:13:15: Imiryango ibiri n’igice cy’umuryango by’Abisirayeli na gakondo yabo15.Mose ni we wagerereye Abarubeni igihugu nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:13:16: 16.Igihugu bahawe cyaheraga kuri Aroweri mu ruhande rw’ikibaya cya Arunoni, n’umudugudu wo hagati mu kibaya n’igitwa cyose cy’i Medeba
yosuwa:13:17: 17.n’i Heshiboni, imidugudu yose y’ibitwa n’i Diboni n’i Bamotibāli n’i Betibālimeyoni,
yosuwa:13:18: 18.n’i Yahasi n’i Kedemoti n’i Mefāti,
yosuwa:13:19: 19.n’i Kiriyatayimu n’i Sibuma n’i Seretishahari hari ku musozi uri mu kibaya,
yosuwa:13:20: 20.n’i Betipewori n’imirenge y’i Pisiga n’i Betiyeshimoti,
yosuwa:13:21: 21.n’imidugudu yose y’ibitwa n’igihugu cyose cya Sihoni umwami w’Abamori watwaraga i Heshiboni, uwo Mose yanesheje hamwe n’abatware ba Midiyani: Evi na Rekemu na Suri na Huri na Reba, ari bo batware ba Sihoni babaga muri icyo gihugu.
yosuwa:13:22: 22.Kandi Balāmu mwene Bewori w’umucunnyi, Abisirayeli bamwicishije inkota hamwe n’abandi bishwe.
yosuwa:13:23: 23.Ariko urugabano rw’Abarubeni rwari Yorodani n’inkuka zayo. Iyi ni yo gakondo y’Abarubeni nk’uko amazu yabo ari, n’imidugudu n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:13:24: 24.Kandi Mose ni we wagerereye umuryango w’Abagadi nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:13:25: 25.Igihugu bahawe cyari Yazeri n’imidugudu yose y’i Galeyadi n’igice cy’igihugu cy’Abamoni kugeza kuri Aroweri hateganye n’i Raba,
yosuwa:13:26: 26.uhereye i Heshiboni ukageza i Ramatimisipa n’i Betonimu, uhereye i Mahanayimu ukageza mu rugabano rw’i Debira.
yosuwa:13:27: 27.Kandi iyo mu kibaya n’i Betiharamu n’i Betinimura, n’i Sukoti n’i Safoni n’igice cy’igihugu cya Sihoni umwami w’i Heshiboni cyari cyasigaye, na Yorodani n’inkuka zayo ukageza mu bigobe by’inyanja y’i Kinereti iburasirazuba bwa Yorodani.
yosuwa:13:28: 28.Iyi ni yo gakondo y’Abagadi nk’uko amazu yabo ari, n’imidugudu n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:13:29: 29.Kandi Mose ni we wagerereye igice cy’umuryango wa Manase, haba ahabo nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:13:30: 30.Igihugu bahawe cyageraga i Mahanayimu n’i Bashani yose, igihugu cyose cya Ogi umwami w’i Bashani, n’imidugudu yose ya Yayiri yo muri Bashani, yose yari mirongo itandatu,
yosuwa:13:31: 31.n’igice cy’i Galeyadi na Ashitaroti na Edureyi, imidugudu y’igihugu cya Ogi cy’i Bashani, yari iya bene Makiri mwene Manase. Ni cyo cya gice cya bene Makiri nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:13:32: 32.Uko ni ko Mose yagabanije igihugu cy’ibitwa bya Mowabu, hakurya ya Yorodani herekeye i Yeriko iburasirazuba.
yosuwa:13:33: 33.Ariko umuryango w’Abalewi wo Mose nta ho yabahaye kuba gakondo yabo, ahubwo Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli ni yo gakondo yabo nk’uko yababwiye.
yosuwa:14:1: Yosuwa agabanya iyindi miryango y’Abisirayeli1.Uko ni ko Abisirayeli bahindūye igihugu cy’i Kanāni kiba gakondo yabo, kandi Eleyazari umutambyi na Yosuwa mwene Nuni, n’abatware b’amazu yose y’imiryango y’Abisirayeli barakibagabanya.
yosuwa:14:2: 2.Imigabane irafindirwa nk’uko Uwiteka yari yarabitegekesheje Mose, iyo iba gakondo y’imiryango cyenda n’igice cy’umuryango,
yosuwa:14:3: 3.kuko Mose ari we wari watanze gakondo y’imiryango ibiri n’igice cy’umuryango hakurya ya Yorodani ariko Abalewi bo ntiyabahaye gakondo mu bandi.
yosuwa:14:4: 4.Kandi bene Yosefu bari imiryango ibiri, Manase na Efurayimu. Nta mugabane bari bahaye Abalewi mu gihugu, keretse imidugudu yo guturamo n’ibikingi byabo byo kuragiramo inka zabo, no gushyiramo ibintu byabo.
yosuwa:14:5: 5.Nk’uko Uwiteka yategetse Mose, ni ko Abisirayeli babigenje bagabana igihugu.
yosuwa:14:6: Agabira Kalebu mwene Yefune i Heburoni6.Abayuda baherako basanga Yosuwa i Gilugali, Kalebu mwene Yefune Umukenazi aramubaza ati “Ntuzi icyo Uwiteka yatuvuzeho jyewe nawe, akabibwira Mose umuntu w’Imana turi i Kadeshi y’i Baruneya?
yosuwa:14:7: 7.Icyo gihe nari maze imyaka mirongo ine, twari tukiri i Kadeshi y’i Baruneya, Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka antuma kujya gutata igihugu. Bukeye ngarutse muhamiriza ibyo nari nabonye n’umutima utabeshya.
yosuwa:14:8: 8.Ariko bene data twajyanye bahīsha imitima y’abantu ubwoba, jyeweho nomatanye n’Uwiteka Imana yanjye rwose.
yosuwa:14:9: 9.Maze uwo munsi Mose ararahira ati ‘Ni ukuri igihugu wakandagiyemo kizaba gakondo yawe n’iy’abana bawe iteka ryose, kuko womatanye n’Uwiteka Imana yanjye rwose.’ ”
yosuwa:14:10: 10.Nuko Kalebu arongera aravuga ati “Kandi dore Uwiteka yatumye mara iyi myaka mirongo ine n’itanu nk’uko yavuze, uhereye igihe Uwiteka yabibwiriye Mose, Abisirayeli bakizerera mu butayu. None dore uyu munsi nshyikije imyaka mirongo inani n’itanu.
yosuwa:14:11: 11.Ubu ndacyafite imbaraga nk’uko nari nzifite urya munsi Mose yanyoherejeho. Uko imbaraga zanjye zameraga ku rugamba, ntabara ngatabaruka, na n’ubu ni ko zikiri.
yosuwa:14:12: 12.None umpe umusozi Uwiteka yavuze urya munsi. Icyo gihe wumvaga ko Abānaki bari bahari, kandi ko hariho imidugudu minini igoswe n’inkike z’amabuye. None ahari aho Uwiteka azaba ari kumwe nanjye, mbirukane nk’uko Uwiteka yavuze.”
yosuwa:14:13: 13.Yosuwa aha Kalebu mwene Yefune umugisha, maze amuha umusozi witwa Heburoni ngo habe gakondo ye.
yosuwa:14:14: 14.Ni cyo cyatumye i Heburoni haba gakondo ya Kalebu mwene Yefune w’Umukenazi na bugingo n’ubu, kuko yomatanye n’Uwiteka Imana y’Abisirayeli rwose.
yosuwa:14:15: 15.Kandi i Heburoni kera hitwaga Kiriyataruba. Aruba uwo yari umuntu wo mu Bānaki ukomeye kuruta abandi. Nuko igihugu gihabwa ihumure.
yosuwa:15:1: Umugabane w’Abayuda1.Umugabane w’umuryango w’Abayuda nk’uko amazu yabo ari, wagarukiraga ku rugabano rwa Edomu mu butayu bwa Zini ikusi, ku iherezo ryaho.
yosuwa:15:2: 2.Kandi urugabano rwabo rw’ikusi rwaheraga mu iherezo y’Inyanja y’Umunyu mu kigobe cyayo cyerekeye ikusi,
yosuwa:15:3: 3.rukazamuka kuri Akurabimu rwerekeye ikusi rukajya i Zini, rukazamuka iruhande rw’ikusi rw’i Kadeshi y’i Baruneya rukanyura bugufi bw’i Heseroni, rukazamuka kuri Adari rugakebereza i Karika,
yosuwa:15:4: 4.rukanyura kuri Asimoni rugarukira ku kagezi ka Egiputa, maze urugabano rukagarukira ku Nyanja Nini. Urwo ni rwo rugabano rwabo rw’ikusi.
yosuwa:15:5: 5.Kandi urugabano rw’iburasirazuba rwari Inyanja y’Umunyu, ukageza aho Yorodani igarukira. Kandi urugabano rw’ikasikazi rwaheraga ku iherezo rya Yorodani ku nyanja.
yosuwa:15:6: 6.Urwo rugabano rwazamukaga i Betihogula rugahita iruhande rw’ikasikazi rw’i Betaraba, rukazamuka rukagera ku gitare cya Bohani mwene Rubeni,
yosuwa:15:7: 7.rugakomeza rukagera i Debira uvuye mu gikombe cya Akori, rukagenda rutyo rujya ikasikazi herekeye i Gilugali, hateganye n’inzira izamuka kuri Adumimu umusozi wo hakurya y’umugezi ikusi, nuko urugabano rugakomeza rukagera ku mazi ya Enishemeshi rukagarukira kuri Enirogeli,
yosuwa:15:8: 8.kandi rukazamuka mu gikombe cya mwene Hinomu kiri mu ruhande rw’igihugu cy’Abayebusi ikusi (ari cyo cyo gihugu cy’i Yerusalemu), rugakomeza rukagera ku mpinga y’umusozi werekeye igikombe cya mwene Hinomu iburengerazuba, ku iherezo ry’igikombe cy’Abarafa ikasikazi.
yosuwa:15:9: 9.Nuko urugabano rukamanuka mu mpinga y’umusozi rukagera ku isōko y’amazi y’i Nefutowa, rukagarukira mu midugudu yo ku musozi wa Efuroni. Urugabano rugakomeza rukajya i Bāla (uwo mudugudu ni wo witwa Kiriyatiyeyarimu).
yosuwa:15:10: 10.Nuko rugakebereza iburengerazuba bw’i Bāla ku musozi wa Seyiri, rukanyuraho rukagera mu ruhande rw’umusozi wa Yeyarimu rw’ikasikazi (ari wo Kasaloni), rukamanukana i Betishemeshi rukanyura i Timuna.
yosuwa:15:11: 11.Kandi urwo rugabano rukagarukira mu ruhande rwa Ekuroni ikasikazi, rukaza rutyo i Shikeroni rukanyuraho rukagera ku musozi wa Bāla rukagarukira i Yabunēli, kandi iherezo ryarwo ryari ku nyanja.
yosuwa:15:12: 12.Kandi urugabano rw’iburasirazuba rwari Inyanja Nini n’ikibaya cyayo. Urwo ni rwo rugabano rwose rw’umuryango w’Abayuda nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:15:13: Kalebu ahindūra imisozi yahawe (Abac 1.11-15)13.Nuko Kalebu mwene Yefune, Yosuwa amuha gakondo muri bene Yuda nk’uko Uwiteka yamutegetse, amuha i Kiriyataruba (Aruba uwo ni we se wa Anaki). Ni ho hitwa i Heburoni.
yosuwa:15:14: 14.Maze Kalebu yirukanamo bene Anaki batatu ari bo aba: Sheshayi na Ahimani na Talumayi, bene Anaki.
yosuwa:15:15: 15.Nuko avayo atera ab’i Debira, Debira kera hitwaga i Kiriyatiseferi.
yosuwa:15:16: 16.Kalebu aravuga ati “Umuntu uzatera i Kiriyatiseferi akahanesha, nzamushyingira umukobwa wanjye Akisa.”
yosuwa:15:17: 17.Otiniyeli mwene Kenazi murumuna wa Kalebu, ni we wahahindūye maze Kalebu aramumushyingira.
yosuwa:15:18: 18.Nuko wa mukobwa agitaha kwa Otiniyeli, aramuhendahenda ngo asabe se igikingi. Ava ku ndogobe ye, Kalebu aramubaza ati “Urashaka iki?”
yosuwa:15:19: 19.Uwo mukobwa aramusubiza ati “Ungirire ubuntu. Dore wampaye igikingi ikusi, mbese ntiwampa n’amasōko y’amazi?” Nuko amuha amasōko yo haruguru n’ayo hepfo.
yosuwa:15:20: 20.Iyo ni yo gakondo y’umuryango wa Abayuda nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:15:21: Imidugudu y’umuryango w’Abayuda21.Iyi ni yo midugudu y’umuryango w’Abayuda yo mu rugabano rwa Edomu ikusi: Kabusēli na Ederi na Yagura,
yosuwa:15:22: 22.na Kina na Dimona na Adada,
yosuwa:15:23: 23.na Kedeshi na Hasori na Itunani,
yosuwa:15:24: 24.na Zifu na Telemu na Beyaloti,
yosuwa:15:25: 25.na Hasorihadata na Keriyotiheseroni (ari wo Hasori),
yosuwa:15:26: 26.na Amamu na Shema na Molada,
yosuwa:15:27: 27.na Hasarigada na Heshimoni na Betipeleti,
yosuwa:15:28: 28.na Hasarishuwali na Bērisheba na Biziyotiya,
yosuwa:15:29: 29.na Bāla na Iyimu na Esemu,
yosuwa:15:30: 30.na Elitoladi na Kesili na Horuma,
yosuwa:15:31: 31.na Sikulagi na Madumana na Sanusana,
yosuwa:15:32: 32.na Lebawota na Shiluhimu, na Ayini na Rimoni. Imidugudu yose yari makumyabiri n’icyenda hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:33: 33.Iyo mu kibaya ngiyi: Eshitawoli na Sora na Ashuna,
yosuwa:15:34: 34.na Zanowa na Eniganimu, na Tapuwa na Enamu,
yosuwa:15:35: 35.na Yaramuti na Adulamu, na Soko na Azeka,
yosuwa:15:36: 36.na Shārayimu na Aditayimu, na Gedera na Gederotayimu. Yose ni cumi n’ine hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:37: 37.Senani na Hadasha na Migidoligadi,
yosuwa:15:38: 38.na Dilani na Misipa na Yokitēli,
yosuwa:15:39: 39.na Lakishi na Bosikati na Eguloni,
yosuwa:15:40: 40.na Kaboni na Lahimasi na Kitilishi,
yosuwa:15:41: 41.na Gederoti na Betidagoni, na Nama na Makeda. Yose ni cumi n’itandatu hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:42: 42.Libuna na Eteri na Ashani,
yosuwa:15:43: 43.na Ifuta na Ashuna na Nesibu,
yosuwa:15:44: 44.na Keyila na Akizibu na Maresha. Yose ni icyenda hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:45: 45.Ekuroni hamwe n’imidugudu n’ibirorero byawo,
yosuwa:15:46: 46.uhereye Ekuroni ukageza ku nyanja, imidugudu yose yo mu ruhande rwo kuri Ashidodi hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:47: 47.Ashidodi n’imidugudu n’ibirorero byaho, i Gaza n’imidugudu n’ibirorero byaho, ukageza ku kagezi ka Egiputa n’Inyanja Nini n’ikibaya cyayo.
yosuwa:15:48: 48.Iyo mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire ngiyi: Shamiri na na Yatiri na Soko,
yosuwa:15:49: 49.na Dana na Kiriyatisana (ari wo Debira),
yosuwa:15:50: 50.na Anabu na Eshitemowa na Animu,
yosuwa:15:51: 51.na Gosheni na Holoni na Gilo. Imidugudu ni cumi n’umwe hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:52: 52.Araba na Duma na Eshana,
yosuwa:15:53: 53.na Yanimu na Betitapuwa na Afeka,
yosuwa:15:54: 54.na Humata na Kiriyataruba (ari wo Heburoni) na Siyori. Imidugudu ni icyenda hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:55: 55.Mawoni na Karumeli, na Zifu na Yuta,
yosuwa:15:56: 56.na Yezerēli na Yokideyamu na Zanowa,
yosuwa:15:57: 57.na Kayini na Gibeya na Timuna. Imidugudu ni icumi hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:58: 58.Halihuli na Betisuri na Gedori,
yosuwa:15:59: 59.na Mārati na Betanoti na Elitekoni. Imidugudu ni itandatu hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:60: 60.Kiriyatibāli (ari wo Kiriyatiyeyarimu) n’i Raba. Imidugudu ni ibiri hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:61: 61.Iyo mu butayu ngiyi: Betaraba na Midina na Sekaka,
yosuwa:15:62: 62.na Nibushani n’umudugudu w’umunyu na Enigedi. Imidugudu ni itandatu hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:15:63: 63.Ariko Abayebusi bo bari abaturage b’i Yerusalemu, Abayuda ntibashoboye kubirukana. Nuko Abayebusi bagumana n’Abayuda i Yerusalemu na bugingo n’ubu.
yosuwa:16:1: Umugabane w’Abefurayimu1.Umugabane wa bene Yosefu waheraga i Yorodani hateganye n’i Yeriko, no ku mazi ya Yeriko iburasirazuba mu butayu Urugabano rwawo rukazamuka ruva i Yeriko, rukanyura mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire rukagera i Beteli,
yosuwa:16:2: 2.rugahera i Beteli rujya i Luzi, rukanyura mu rugabano rw’Abaruki rukagera Ataroti,
yosuwa:16:3: 3.rukamanukana iburengerazuba ku rugabano rw’Abayafuleti kugeza mu rugabano rwa Betihoroni yo hepfo ari yo Gezeri, kandi iherezo ryawo ryari inyanja.
yosuwa:16:4: 4.Nuko bene Yosefu, Abamanase n’Abefurayimu benda gakondo yabo.
yosuwa:16:5: 5.Kandi urugabano rw’Abefurayimu nk’uko amazu yabo ari rwaje rutya: urugabano rwa gakondo yabo rw’iburasirazuba rwari Atarotadara ukageza i Betihoroni yo haruguru.
yosuwa:16:6: 6.Urugabano rw’iburengerazuba rukagarukira i Mikimetati ikasikazi, maze rugakebereza iburasirazuba rukajya i Tanatishilo, rukanyura iburasirazuba bw’i Yanowa.
yosuwa:16:7: 7.Kandi rukava i Yanowa rukamanukana Ataroti n’i Nāra rukagera i Yeriko, rukagarukira kuri Yorodani,
yosuwa:16:8: 8.rukagera i Tapuwa rugakomeza iburasirazuba rukagera ku kagezi kitwa Kana, maze rukagarukira ku nyanja. Iyo ni yo gakondo y’Abefurayimu nk’uko amazu yabo ari,
yosuwa:16:9: 9.hamwe n’imidugudu yarobanuriwe Abefurayimu hagati ya gakondo y’Abamanase, imidugudu yose n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:16:10: 10.Ariko ntibirukanayo Abanyakanāni babaga i Gezeri, ahubwo Abanyakanāni baturana n’Abefurayimu na bugingo n’ubu, bahinduka abaretwa babo.
yosuwa:17:1: Umugabane w’Abamanase1.Bafindira umugabane w’umuryango wa Manase, kuko ari we mfura ya Yosefu. Makiri yari imfura ya Manase sekuru wa Gileyadi ni we wahawe iyi misozi: i Galeyadi n’i Bashani kuko yari intwari.
yosuwa:17:2: 2.Bafindira n’umugabane wa bene Manase bandi nk’uko amazu yabo ari. Abo ni bo Abiyezeri na bene Heleki, na bene Asiriyeli na bene Shekemu, na bene Heferi na bene Shemida. Aba bavuzwe ni bo bahungu ba Manase mwene Yosefu nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:17:3: 3.Ariko Selofehadi mwene Heferi mwene Gileyadi, mwene Makiri mwene Manase ntiyabyaye abahungu, keretse abakobwa kandi aya ni yo mazina yabo: Mahila na Nowa na Hogila, na Miluka na Tirusa.
yosuwa:17:4: 4.Barahaguruka basanga Eleyazari umutambyi, na Yosuwa mwene Nuni n’abatware babo baravuga bati “Uwiteka yategetse Mose yuko aduhana gakondo na bene wacu.” Ni cyo cyatumye abahana gakondo na bene se, bakurikije itegeko ry’Uwiteka.
yosuwa:17:5: 5.Nuko umuryango wa Manase uhabwa imigabane cumi, uretse ibihugu by’i Galeyadi n’i Bashani byo hakurya ya Yorodani,
yosuwa:17:6: 6.kuko abakobwa ba Manase bahanywe gakondo n’abahungu be, kandi bene Manase bandi bahabwa i Galeyadi.
yosuwa:17:7: 7.Nuko urugabano rw’Abamanase rwaheraga i Bwasheri rukageza i Mikimetati herekeye i Shekemu, maze urugabano rukanyura iburyo rukagera Enitapuwa.
yosuwa:17:8: 8.Igihugu cy’i Tapuwa cyari icya Manase, ariko i Tapuwa hafi y’urugabano rw’Abamanase hari ah’Abefurayimu.
yosuwa:17:9: 9.Nuko urugabano rumanukira ku kagezi kitwa Kana, ikusi yako. Iyo midugudu yari iy’Abefurayimu, ariko rero yari hagati y’iy’Abamanase. Urugabano rw’Abamanase rwari ikasikazi ya ka kagezi kandi iherezo ryarwo ryari inyanja.
yosuwa:17:10: 10.Kandi ikusi yako haba ah’Abefurayimu, ikasikazi yako haba ah’Abamanase, kandi inyanja ni rwo rugabano rwabo. Nuko bagera i Bwasheri ikasikazi, n’i Bwisakari iburasirazuba.
yosuwa:17:11: 11.Abamanase bahabwa mu Bisakari no mu Bashēri imidugudu yitwaga Betisheyani n’imidugudu yaho, na Ibuleyamu n’imidugudu yaho, n’abaturage b’i Dori n’imidugudu yaho, n’aba Endori n’imidugudu yaho, n’ab’i Tānaki n’imidugudu yaho, n’ab’i Megido n’imidugudu yaho, ari yo misozi itatu.
yosuwa:17:12: 12.Bene Manase ntibabasha kwirukana bene iyo midugudu, ariko Abanyakanāni bashaka kuguma muri icyo gihugu.
yosuwa:17:13: 13.Abisirayeli bamaze gukomera bakoresha Abanyakanāni ikoro, ntibabirukana umuhashya.
yosuwa:17:14: Bene Yosefu basaba kongererwa umugabane wabo14.Ab’umuryango wa Yosefu babaza Yosuwa bati “Ni iki cyatumye uduha umugabane umwe gusa n’igice kimwe kuba gakondo yacu, kandi uzi ko turi umuryango munini kuko Uwiteka yaduhaye umugisha kugeza ubu?”
yosuwa:17:15: 15.Nuko Yosuwa arabasubiza ati “Niba muri umuryango munini nimuzamuke mujye mu kibira, mugiteme mwiyagurire mu gihugu cy’Abaferizi n’Abarafa, kuko igihugu cy’imisozi ya Efurayimu ari imfungane kuri mwe.”
yosuwa:17:16: 16.Abayosefu baravuga bati “Igihugu cy’imisozi ntabwo cyadukwira, kandi Abanyakanāni bose b’i Betisheyani n’imidugudu yaho, n’abari mu kibaya cy’i Yezerēli uko batuye mu gihugu cy’ibibaya, bafite amagare y’ibyuma.”
yosuwa:17:17: 17.Yosuwa aherako abwira umuryango wa Yosefu, ari bo Befurayimu n’Abamanase ati “Muri umuryango munini koko kandi mufite imbaraga nyinshi, ntimwahabwa umugabane umwe gusa
yosuwa:17:18: 18.ahubwo igihugu cy’imisozi miremire kizabe icyanyu. Kandi naho ari ikibira muzagiteme n’imirenge yayo izabe iyanyu, ariko Abanyakanāni nubwo ari abanyambaraga bafite n’amagare y’ibyuma, muzabirukane.”
yosuwa:18:1: Imiryango irindwi ituma intumwa zo kujya kureba uko bakebewe1.Nuko iteraniro ryose ry’Abisirayeli riteranira i Shilo bashingayo ihema ry’ibonaniro, igihugu kirabagomōkera.
yosuwa:18:2: 2.Kandi mu Bisirayeli hari hasigaye imiryango irindwi, itaragererwa igihugu ngo kibe gakondo yabo.
yosuwa:18:3: 3.Yosuwa abwira Abisirayeli ati “Muzageza he kugira ubute bwo guhindūra igihugu, Uwiteka Imana ya ba sogokuruza yabahaye?
yosuwa:18:4: 4.Nuko nimutore abagabo batatu uko umuryango wose uri, mubanzanire mbohereze bagende igihugu bandika ingabano zacyo nk’uko gakondo y’imiryango iri, nibarangiza bazagaruke aho ndi.”
yosuwa:18:5: 5.Maze ati “Bazakigabanyemo karindwi: Abayuda bazaguma mu rugabano rwabo ikusi, n’Abayosefu bazaguma ahabo ikasikazi.
yosuwa:18:6: 6.Maze muzandike igihugu mo imigabane irindwi, nimurangiza muzanzanire urwo rwandiko hano, nanjye nzakibagabanisha ubufindo imbere y’Uwiteka Imana yacu.
yosuwa:18:7: 7.Abalewi ntibafite umugabane muri mwe, ahubwo ubutambyi bw’Uwiteka ni bwo gakondo yabo. N’Abagadi n’Abarubeni n’ab’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase, bamaze guhabwa gakondo yabo hakurya ya Yorodani iburasirazuba, ni ho Mose umugaragu w’Uwiteka yabahaye.”
yosuwa:18:8: 8.Nuko abo bantu barahaguruka baragenda, bakigenda bajya kwandika ingabano z’igihugu Yosuwa arabihanangiriza ati “Nimugende, mugende igihugu cyose mwandike ingabano zacyo maze muzagaruke aho ndi, nanjye nzakibagabanisha ubufindo imbere y’Uwiteka hano i Shilo.”
yosuwa:18:9: 9.Abo bantu baragenda, bagenda icyo gihugu bandika imigabane yacyo mu gitabo uko ari irindwi, bashyiraho n’imidugudu yaho. Maze basubirayo basanga Yosuwa mu ngerero z’i Shilo.
yosuwa:18:10: 10.Nuko Yosuwa abagabanisha ubufindo imbere y’Uwiteka i Shilo, agabanya Abisirayeli icyo gihugu nk’uko imiryango yabo iri.
yosuwa:18:11: Umugabane w’Ababenyamini11.Umugabane w’umuryango w’Ababenyamini uboneka nk’uko amazu yabo ari, kandi urugabano rwabo ruhera muri bene Yuda na bene Yosefu.
yosuwa:18:12: 12.Urugabano rw’ikasikazi rwaheraga kuri Yorodani, rukazamuka mu rugabano rw’i Yeriko rwerekeye ikasikazi, rukanyura mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire iburengerazuba rukagarukira mu butayu bw’i Betaveni.
yosuwa:18:13: 13.Rugakomeza i Luzi (ari yo Beteli) mu rugabano rwaho rwerekeye ikusi, rukamanukira Atarotadara iruhande rw’umusozi ikusi y’i Betihoroni yo hepfo.
yosuwa:18:14: 14.Nuko rugeze ku ruhande rw’iburengerazuba rugakebereza aho rujya ikusi, uhereye ku musozi uteganye n’i Betihoroni ikusi, rukagarukira i Kiriyatibāli (ari yo Kiriyatiyeyarimu) umudugudu w’Abayuda. Urwo ni rwo rugabano rw’iburengerazuba.
yosuwa:18:15: 15.Urugabano rw’ikusi rugahera ku iherezo ry’i Kiriyatiyeyarimu rukagera iburengerazuba, rukagarukira ku isōko y’amazi ya Nefutowa.
yosuwa:18:16: 16.Maze rukamanukana mu iherezo ry’umusozi uteganye n’igikombe cya mwene Hinomu, aho gisāngānira mu gikombe cy’Abarafa ikasikazi, rukamanukana muri icyo gikombe cya Hinomu ruteganye n’Abayebusi ikusi, rukagera kuri Enirogeli.
yosuwa:18:17: 17.Bakaruzana batyo ikasikazi rukagarukira Enishemeshi, rukajya i Geliloti hakurya y’inzira izamuka kuri Adumimu, maze rukamanuka ku gitare cya Bohani mwene Rubeni,
yosuwa:18:18: 18.rukanyura iruhande ruteganye na Araba ikasikazi rukamanukana muri Araba,
yosuwa:18:19: 19.rukanyuraho rukagera mu ruhande rw’i Betihogula ikasikazi, kandi iherezo ryarwo riba ikigobe cy’Inyanja y’Umunyu ikasikazi, ikusi ya Yorodani. Urwo ni rwo rugabano rw’ikusi.
yosuwa:18:20: 20.Kandi Yorodani yabaye urugabano rwaho iburasirazuba. Iyo ni yo gakondo y’Ababenyamini nk’uko ingabano zayo zazengurutse, nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:18:21: 21.Kandi imidugudu y’umuryango w’Ababenyamini nk’uko amazu yabo ari ngiyi: Yeriko na Betihogula na Emekikesisi,
yosuwa:18:22: 22.na Betaraba na Semarayimu na Beteli,
yosuwa:18:23: 23.na Avimu na Para na Ofura,
yosuwa:18:24: 24.na Kefaramoni na Ofuni na Geba. Imidugudu ni cumi n’ibiri hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:18:25: 25.Gibeyoni na Rama na Bēroti,
yosuwa:18:26: 26.na Misipa na Kefira na Mosa,
yosuwa:18:27: 27.na Rekemu na Irupēli na Tarala,
yosuwa:18:28: 28.na Sela na Elefu na Yebusi (ari yo i Yerusalemu), na Gibeya na Kiriyati. Imidugudu ni cumi n’ine n’ibirorero byayo. Iyo ni yo gakondo y’Ababenyamini nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:1: Umugabane w’Abasimeyoni1.Nuko ubufindo bwa kabiri bwerekana Simiyoni. Ni wo muryango w’Abasimeyoni nk’uko amazu yabo ari, kandi umugabane wabo wari hagati mu mugabane w’Abayuda.
yosuwa:19:2: 2.Nuko bahabwa iyi midugudu ngo ibe gakondo yabo: Bērisheba cyangwa Sheba na Molada,
yosuwa:19:3: 3.na Hasarishuwali na Bala na Esemu,
yosuwa:19:4: 4.na Elitoladi na Betula na Horuma,
yosuwa:19:5: 5.na Sikulagi na Betimarukaboti na Hasarisusa,
yosuwa:19:6: 6.na Betilebawoti na Sharuheni. Imidugudu ni cumi n’itatu hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:19:7: 7.Ayini na Rimoni, na Eteri na Ashani. Imidugudu ine n’ibirorero byayo,
yosuwa:19:8: 8.hamwe n’ibirorero byose bikikije iyo midugudu kugeza i Bālatibēri, ari yo Rama ikusi. Iyo ni yo gakondo y’umuryango w’Abasimeyoni nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:9: 9.Ariko umugabane w’Abasimeyoni wakuwe mu mugabane w’Abayuda, kuko igice cy’Abayuda cyabaruse ubwinshi. Ni cyo cyatumye Abasimeyoni bahabwa gakondo hagati muri gakondo yabo.
yosuwa:19:10: Umugabane w’Abazebuluni10.Ubufindo bwa gatatu bwerekana Abazebuluni nk’uko amazu yabo ari. Kandi urugabano rwa gakondo yabo rugera i Sarida,
yosuwa:19:11: 11.rukazamurwa iburengerazuba kugeza i Marala rukagera n’i Dabesheti, rukagera ku kagezi kari imbere ya Yokineyamu.
yosuwa:19:12: 12.Uhereye i Sarida rugakebereza iburasirazuba rukagera mu rugabano rwa Kisilotitabora, rukagarukira i Daberati rukazamuka rugera i Yafiya.
yosuwa:19:13: 13.Uhereye aho rukanyura iburasirazuba rukagera i Gatiheferi na Etikasini, rukagarukira i Rimoni rugakomeza i Neya,
yosuwa:19:14: 14.rugakebereza aho ikasikazi rujya i Hanatoni, kandi iherezo ryarwo ryari mu gikombe cya Ifutaheli.
yosuwa:19:15: 15.Kandi bahabwa i Katati n’i Nahalali, n’i Shimuroni n’i Dala n’i Betelehemu. Yose ni imidugudu cumi n’ibiri hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:19:16: 16.Iyo ni yo gakondo y’Abazebuluni nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:17: Umugabane w’Abisakari17.Ubufindo bwa kane bwerekana Abisakari nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:18: 18.Urugabano rwabo rwagarukiraga i Yezerēli n’i Kesuloti n’i Shunemu,
yosuwa:19:19: 19.n’i Hafarayimu n’i Shiyoni na Anaharati,
yosuwa:19:20: 20.n’i Rabiti n’i Kishiyoni na Ebeza,
yosuwa:19:21: 21.n’i Remeti na Eniganimu na Enihada n’i Betipazezi,
yosuwa:19:22: 22.maze urugabano rukagarukira i Tabora n’i Shahazuma n’i Betishemeshi, kandi iherezo ry’urugabano rwabo ryari Yorodani. Yose ni imidugudu cumi n’itandatu hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:19:23: 23.Iyo ni yo gakondo y’umuryango w’Abisakari nk’uko amazu yabo ari, imidugudu n’ibirorero.
yosuwa:19:24: Umugabane w’Abashēri24.Ubufindo bwa gatanu bwerekana Abashēri nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:25: 25.Urugabano rwabo rwari i Helikati n’i Hali, n’i Beteni na Akishafu,
yosuwa:19:26: 26.na Alameleki na Amadi n’i Mishali, nuko rukagera i Karumeli iburengerazuba, n’i Shihorilibunati,
yosuwa:19:27: 27.rugakebereza iburasirazuba rukagera i Betidagoni, maze rukagera i Zebuluni no mu gikombe cya Ifutaheli, rukagera i Betemeki n’i Neyeli ikasikazi rukagarukira i Kabuli ibumoso,
yosuwa:19:28: 28.na Eburoni n’i Rehobu, n’i Hamoni n’i Kana no kugeza i Sidoni nini.
yosuwa:19:29: 29.Nuko urugabano rugakebereza i Rama, rukagera no ku mudugudu w’i Tiro ugoswe n’inkike z’amabuye, maze urugabano rugakebereza i Hosa kandi iherezo ryarwo ryari inyanja hegeranye n’i Akizibu,
yosuwa:19:30: 30.kandi bahabwa na Uma na Afika n’i Rehobu. Yose ni imidugudu makumyabiri n’ibiri hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:19:31: 31.Iyo ni yo gakondo y’Abashēri nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:32: Umugabane w’Abanafutali32.Ubufindo bwa gatandatu bwerekana Abanafutali, ari bo bene Nafutali nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:33: 33.Urugabano rwabo rwaheraga i Helefi ku giti cy’umwela kiri i Sananimu, na Adaminekebu n’i Yabunēli kugeza i Lakumu, kandi iherezo ryarwo ryari Yorodani.
yosuwa:19:34: 34.Maze urugabano rugakebereza iburengerazuba rukagera Azinotitabora, uhereye aho rukagarukira i Hukoki. Nuko rukagera i Buzebuluni ikusi, rukagera i Bwasheri iburengerazuba, kandi i Buyuda kuri Yorodani iburasirazuba.
yosuwa:19:35: 35.Kandi imidugudu igoswe n’inkike z’amabuye bahawe ngiyi: Sidimu na Sera na Hamati, na Rakati na Kinereti,
yosuwa:19:36: 36.na Adama na Rama na Hasori,
yosuwa:19:37: 37.na Kedeshi na Edureyi na Enihasori,
yosuwa:19:38: 38.na Ironi na Migidoleli na Horemu, na Betanati na Betishemeshi. Yose ni imidugudu cumi n’icyenda hamwe n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:19:39: 39.Iyo ni yo gakondo y’umuryango w’Abanafutali nk’uko amazu yabo ari, imidugudu n’ibirorero byayo.
yosuwa:19:40: Umugabane w’Abadani40.Ubufindo bwa karindwi bwerekana umuryango w’Abadani nk’uko amazu yabo ari.
yosuwa:19:41: 41.Kandi urugabano rwa gakondo yabo rwari i Sora na Eshitawoli na Irishemeshi,
yosuwa:19:42: 42.n’i Shālabini na Ayaloni na Itula,
yosuwa:19:43: 43.na Eloni n’i Timuna na Ekuroni,
yosuwa:19:44: 44.na Eliteke n’i Gibetoni n’i Bālati,
yosuwa:19:45: 45.n’i Yahudi n’i Beneberaki n’i Gatirimoni,
yosuwa:19:46: 46.n’i Meyakoni n’i Rakoni, mu rugabano rwerekeye i Yopa.
yosuwa:19:47: 47.Kandi igihugu cy’Abadani cyisumbura urugabano rwabo, kuko Abadani bazamutse bagatera i Leshemu bakaharwanya, bahaneshesha inkota barahahindūra baturayo, maze i Leshemu bahita i Dani, bahitirira n’izina rya sekuruza Dani.
yosuwa:19:48: 48.Iyo ni yo gakondo y’umuryango w’Abadani nk’uko amazu yabo ari, imidugudu n’ibirorero byabo.
yosuwa:19:49: 49.Nuko barangiza kugabanya igihugu mo gakondo bakurikije ingabano zacyo, kandi Abisirayeli baha Yosuwa mwene Nuni gakondo hagati muri bo
yosuwa:19:50: 50.bakurikije itegeko ry’Uwiteka, bamuha umudugudu yasabye witwa Timunatisera wo mu gihugu cy’imisozi ya Efurayimu, yubakayo umudugudu awuturamo.
yosuwa:19:51: 51.Iyo ni yo gakondo Eleyazari umutambyi na Yosuwa mwene Nuni, n’abatware b’amazu y’imiryango y’Abisirayeli bagabanishije ubufindo i Shilo imbere y’Uwiteka, bari ku muryango w’ihema ry’ibonaniro. Uko ni ko barangije kugabana igihugu.
yosuwa:20:1: Imidugudu y’ubuhungiro1.Uwiteka abwira Yosuwa ati
yosuwa:20:2: 2.“Bwira Abisirayeli uti ‘Mwitoranyirize imidugudu y’ubuhungiro, iyo nabategekesheje ururimi rwa Mose,
yosuwa:20:3: 3.kugira ngo gatozi wishe umuntu wese, atabyitumye cyangwa atabizi ayihungiremo, kandi izajye ibabera ubuhungiro bwo guhunga umuhōzi.’
yosuwa:20:4: 4.Gatozi uhungiye muri umwe muri iyo midugudu, azahagarare ku irembo ry’uwo mudugudu yisobanurire abatware bawo, na bo bazaherako bamwinjiza mu mudugudu bamuhe aho aba.
yosuwa:20:5: 5.Kandi umuhōzi namukurikirayo ntibazamuhe gatozi ngo amuhore, kuko yishe mugenzi we atabyitumye, adasanzwe ari umwanzi we.
yosuwa:20:6: 6.Nuko azagume muri uwo mudugudu kugeza ubwo azahagarara imbere y’iteraniro gucirwa urubanza na bo, ukageza n’igihe umutambyi mukuru yasanze mu butambyi azapfira, maze gatozi azaherako agaruke iwabo mu rugo rwe mu mudugudu yahunzemo.”
yosuwa:20:7: 7.Nuko bitoranyiriza i Kedeshi y’i Galilaya mu gihugu cy’imisozi y’i Bunafutali, n’i Shekemu mu gihugu cy’imisozi y’i Bwefurayimu, n’i Kiriyataruba (ari yo Heburoni) mu gihugu cy’imisozi y’i Buyuda.
yosuwa:20:8: 8.Kandi hakurya ya Yorodani iburasirazuba bw’i Yeriko, batoranyayo i Beseri mu butayu bwo mu bitwa h’umuryango w’Abarubeni, n’i Ramoti y’i Galeyadi h’umuryango w’Abagadi, n’i Golani y’i Bashani h’umuryango w’Abamanase.
yosuwa:20:9: 9.Iyo ni yo midugudu yakubitiwe Abisirayeli bose n’umunyamahanga wese ubasuhukiyemo, kugira ngo uwishe umuntu wese atabyitumye azahungireyo ye kwicwa n’umuhōzi, kugeza ubwo azahagarara imbere y’iteraniro.
yosuwa:21:1: Umugabane w’Abalewi1.Nuko abatware b’amazu y’Abalewi basanga umutambyi Eleyazari, na Yosuwa mwene Nuni n’abatware b’amazu y’imiryango y’Abisirayeli,
yosuwa:21:2: 2.bababwirira aho bari bari i Shilo mu gihugu cy’i Kanāni bati “Uwiteka yategekesheje Mose yuko tuzahabwa imidugudu yo guturamo, hamwe n’ibikingi byayo ngo tuzajye turagiramo amatungo yacu.”
yosuwa:21:3: 3.Nuko Abisirayeli baha Abalewi iyi midugudu hamwe n’ibikingi byayo hagati muri gakondo yabo, nk’uko Uwiteka yategetse.
yosuwa:21:4: 4.Ubufindo bwerekana imigabane y’amazu y’Abakohati bene Aroni umutambyi bo mu Balewi, bahabwa imidugudu cumi n’itatu ku y’umuryango wa Yuda, no ku y’uwa Simiyoni, no ku y’uwa Benyamini.
yosuwa:21:5: 5.Kandi bene Kohati bandi bafindirwa imidugudu cumi ku y’umuryango wa Efurayimu, no ku midugudu y’uwa Dani no ku y’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase.
yosuwa:21:6: 6.Kandi bene Gerushoni bafindirwa imidugudu cumi n’itatu ku y’amazu y’umuryango wa Isakari, no ku y’uwa Asheri, no ku y’uwa Nafutali, no ku y’igice cy’umuryango wa Manase i Bashani.
